Heavy rain, accompanied by occasional thunderstorms, will sweep across the area today and continue into the evening. On average, rainfall amounts are expected to range between 1.25 and 2.5 inches, which could lead to localized flooding, particularly in areas with poor drainage. The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a Flood Watch in effect through tonight. Unfortunately, this wet weather won't be our last encounter. 

A storm system moving southward through the central United States will tap into abundant moisture, triggering another round of rain and thunderstorms, especially on Wednesday afternoon and into Wednesday night. Some of this rain could be heavy as well. Following the front, a few showers may linger into Thursday afternoon. However, it will finally dry out, with more sunshine returning by Friday and continuing through the weekend.

Este viernes, el alcalde de Oviedo, Alfredo Canteli, y el presidente del Colegio Oficial de Aparejadores y Arquitectos Técnicos de Asturias, Joaquín Antonio Suárez, han firmado la renovación del convenio entre ambas instituciones. 

El objetivo del acuerdo, según ha explicado el Ayuntamiento en una nota de prensa, es reconocer a los arquitectos colegiados que figuren en la relación certificada por el Secretario del Colegio Oficial de Aparejadores y Arquitectos Técnicos de Asturias el carácter de representantes en los procedimientos administrativos. 

Estos arquitectos podrán actuar como representantes en los procedimientos tanto del propio Ayuntamiento de Oviedo como de la Fundación Municipal de Cultura, siempre que invoquen tal condición. 

El nuevo convenio tendrá una vigencia de cuatro años.

Continual learning is a specialized form of supervised learning, characterized by sequentially arriving tasks, coupled with additional computational and memory constraints [24, 27, 39, 44, 49] (see Verwimp et al. [51] for a survey of applications). A notable implication of this setup is the inherent performance gap between continual learning and traditional supervised learning. 

To elucidate this further, let us consider the achievable risk under continual learning given a dataset D:
EQUATION
RanDumb
O = C T D T φ( I) I O Figure 1
. Mechanism of RanDumb. Project raw pixels to a high dimensional space using random fourier projections (φ), then decorrelate the features using Mahalanobis distance [31] and classify with the nearest class mean. The online update only involves updating a single covariance matrix and class-means.

Here, R Joint denotes the risk achievable with supervised learning without any constraints, while E CL represents the gap arising from transitioning from fully supervised learning to continual learning which imposes additional constraints such as: resource-constraint (e.g., single-epoch), distribution shift, and predefined task ordering with limited access to data. Because of these additional constraints imposed by continual learning, the risk is non-decreasing and E CL is non-negative. Minimizing E CL has been the primary focus of the continual learning literature [16, 29, 37, 41].

In this work, we discover that the fundamental aspect of continual representation learning (CRL) is often overlooked in the continual learning literature, as most methods merge continual classifier and representation learning. We dissect these two aspects and study the effect of representation learning on E CL. The central question of our work is: Are current continual learning setups overly constrained for effective continual representation learning? Specifically, consider a continual representation learning algorithm CRL which learns a representation from the continual dataset D. Is this representation better than a random (i.e., non-learned) representation RandRep? More formally, is the following quantity positive or negative?

La clasificación de las 4 Horas de Shanghai fue una muestra de los lineamientos que aplicaron las autoridades del Campeonato Mundial de Resistencia (WEC) para equilibrar las performances de los vehículos y, a priori, su cometido se cumplió. El Rebellion número 1 que conducen Senna, Menezes y Sato se quedó con la pole, al marcar un tiempo de 1m45s892, y quebró la racha de diez clasificaciones seguidas con dominio de Toyota. En segundo y tercer lugar se ubicaron los Ginetta del equipo LNT, a 1s217 y 1s343, respectivamente, mientras que luego aparecieron los Toyota TS050 Hybrid, a 2s288 y 2s757.

En el Toyota número 7 giraron el japonés Kamui Kobayashi y el británico Mike Conway, en tanto que no participó de esa instancia clasificatoria el argentino José María López. Cabe recordar que, para esta fecha, tercera del actual Campeonato Mundial de Resistencia, el Automóvil Club del Oeste y la Federación Internacional del Automóvil dispusieron de una brida restrictora en la admisión del TS050 Hybrid, que disminuyó el caudal de combustible de los Toyota.

La competencia se ponía en marcha a la 01:00 (horario de nuestro país) y el japonés Kobayashi era el encargado de largar con el Toyota número 7. Clasificación: 1º Senna - Menezes - Sato (Rebellion), en 1m45s892; 2º Robertson - Simpson - Smith (Ginetta) a 1s217; 3º King - Hanley - Orudzhev (Ginetta) a 1s343; 4º Kobayashi - Conway - López (Toyota) a 2s288 y 5º Buemi - Nakajima - Hartley (Toyota) a 2s757. 

PRENSA WEC TOYOTA. El número 7 de la marca japonesa. "Pechito" largaba cuarto en Shanghai Deportes 10 de noviembre de 2019 Redacción.

In recent years, tech giants like Google and Meta have ventured into Large Language Model (LLM) development. These entities have consistently increased parameter magnitude and the volume of training data in human natural language, aligning with an upward trend. However, research indicates that the quantity of human natural language may soon fall short of matching the enlarged model parameters due to hardware advancements. This has led to the practice of harvesting natural language texts from the web by LLM developers, raising concerns about inadvertent collection of Personal Identifiable Information (PII) embedded in the vast amount of web data used for training, which could lead to post-training disclosure of sensitive information by LLMs.

To mitigate the risk of privacy extraction from disclosed models, LLM providers like OpenAI and Meta have implemented alignment tasks during the training phase to teach models to abstain from responding to privacy-intrusive queries. While there are studies demonstrating the ability to circumvent protective measures like these, the veracity of the divulged privacy remains questionable. This scenario invokes the phenomenon of Catastrophic Forgetting in machine learning, where forgetting previously learned information protects privacy within training data.

LLM fine-tuning in specialized domains has gained increasing adoption, enabling models to acquire domain-specific knowledge and capabilities. OpenAI introduced a fine-tune interface for GPT-3.5 in August 2023, expanding the range of specialized domain tasks that can be accomplished through LLM fine-tuning. However, fine-tuning presents a potential avenue for circumventing safeguards in LLMs, as studies have shown that it can dismantle safety alignment. Further investigation is needed to determine whether fine-tuning can lead to the exposure of personal information.

In a research study, an attack scenario was analyzed where an adversary attempted to utilize a limited number of PII instances to fine-tune LLMs and trigger the recovery and disclosure of additional PII instances. Different methodologies were developed to recover PII embedded within LLMs, with the Janus approach showing enhanced stability and accuracy in PII recovery compared to the Strawman method. The study confirmed that fine-tuning on a small subset of training data could reverse Catastrophic Forgetting on sensitive data learned during LLM training.

Analyzing GPT-3.5, the study found that fine-tuning on a small subset of PII instances could accurately disclose a significant portion of target PIIs. Larger models exhibited stronger memorization capacity on the training data, making them more susceptible to PII recovery attacks. Fine-tuning on a small set of real training data effectively recovered LLM's memorization on pre-training tasks, with duplication of PII strengthening memorization. Compared to prompt engineering, fine-tuning proved more resilient to Catastrophic Forgetting in LLM pre-training processes.

أدي الفريق الأول بالنادي الأهلي أول تدريب لهم على استاد رداس بتونس في استعداد لمباراة الترجي التونسي في إياب نهائي دوري أبطال أفريقيا يوم الجمعة المقبل. وقام النادي بتغيير موقع التدريب من ملعب الجامعة التونسية لكرة القدم بسبب أسباب أمنية. وقد فاز الأهلي في مباراة الذهاب بثلاثة أهداف مقابل هدف واحد في المباراة التي أقيمت الجمعة الماضية على ستاد برج العرب.

حصل المعلم ماجد محمد صالح العويفي، من منسوبي تعليم محافظة المخواة، على درجة "الماجستير" من جامعة الملك عبد العزيز في تخصص الاعتدال والأمن الفكري، بتقدير ممتاز مع مرتبة الشرف الأولى من معهد الأمير خالد الفيصل للاعتدال. قدّم "العويفي" مشروع بحثه تحت عنوان "المشكلات الأسرية وعلاقتها بمظاهر الانحراف الفكري لدى الأسر كما يدركها الأبناء"، وأشرف على مشروعه الأستاذ المشارك في علم النفس ووكيل الكلية للدراسات العليا والبحث العلمي، الدكتور صالح بن يحيى الجار الله. تهنئ "سبق" "العويفي"، وتتمنى له التوفيق في الحصول على الدكتوراه في المرحلة المقبلة.

Ride along with us in the EQC electric SUV. Cruising down the strip in Las Vegas in the Mercedes EQC 400, it’s very possible to completely forget you’re in an electric car. The lights, outside music, and inevitable slow crawl in Vegas strip traffic can remove some of the most enjoyable features of driving electric; that being the instant torque of the electric motor, the quiet cabin, and smooth vibration-less acceleration.

So I was definitely pleased when Mercedes informed me we’d be leaving the lights and action of the Vegas strip and venturing out to Red Rock Canyon for my EQC ride-along. Better yet, we were leaving before dawn, therefore, cruising around the winding canyon roads just as the sun rose.

Yes, I said ride-along, as Mercedes isn’t allowing any EQC press drives just yet, the sole exception being Jay Leno last week, but hey, he is Jay Leno. Luckily, though, the driver was Mercedes engineer, Bastian Schult, who knows how to drive and was more than willing to prove that. When urged, he even pushed the EQC to the point of slightly drifting around a few of the tight curves the canyon provided.

Perhaps aided by the morning dew on the road, but yes, you can drift in an EQC. In hindsight, I really wish I had a drone recording us as we carved up the winding roads of Red Rock at dawn. Schult was enjoying himself a little too much for the other Mercedes representative sitting in the back seat, who, more than once had to say, “OK, that’s enough of that,” before Schult eased off the accelerator and slowed down.

Not a dedicated EV platform
The EQC is not a dedicated-platform EV. It shares many components with the C-Class and GLC line. It’s going to be manufactured on the same line as the C-Class and GLC in Daimler’s plant in Bremen, Germany. Mercedes told us that by sharing the production line and components, they could easily increase or decrease EQC production as needed to meet market demand. Europe will be first to get the EQC, with the launch planned for June 2019. The US will have to wait 7 or 8 months longer until early 2020.

We believe the fact that the EQC doesn’t have a dedicated platform is the reason why there isn’t any storage space under the hood, and also probably part of the reason why the EQC weighs in at a porky 5,346 lbs. We were also told that the next few vehicles coming from the EQ line will be larger than the EQC, have dedicated platforms, and be made at Mercedes’ Tuscaloosa, Alabama plant. In all, there will be 10 all-electric vehicles from Mercedes by 2022.

Range
As for range, Mercedes has been quoting 400 km, which is based on the European WLTP range test. Schult has been driving the EQC for a while now and knows exactly what it’s capable of. He told us of a recent trip when they drove the vehicle (normal driving not hypermiling) 228 miles and had 7% battery left. He added that we’d have to wait for the official EPA range rating but that he expects it to be about 220 miles. That seems about right if you do the math based on the 400 km WLTP rating (by the way, the “400” in the EQC 400 name is based on the 400 km WLTP rating). On other EVs, we’ve noted that the EPA rating has been roughly 10% – 15% lower than the WLTP, and 220 is 12% lower than the 249 mi (400 km) the EQC was rated. For what it’s worth, the car estimated that it had 230 miles of range when we started out in the morning, fully charged.

Charging
The EQC is equipped with a 32-amp onboard charger, good for AC charging up to 7.4 kW. The car will come with a 120-volt portable EVSE in the US, and Mercedes will offer Level 2 charging options for purchase. As for DC Fast charging, the EQC will accept up to 110 kW, allowing the vehicle to charge from 10% to 80% in about 40 minutes. I asked why Mercedes didn’t match the Audi e-tron and provide 150 kW charging, and was told that they believe 110 kW works fine for the 80 kWh battery. If the battery was larger, then they would have possibly allowed a higher charging rate. It was further explained that Mercedes believes 10%-80% in 40 minutes is “quite good” for a 200+ mile EV in today’s market.

Driving Modes
There are four driving modes, plus an Individual customized setting. The four standard modes are: Comfort, Sport, Eco, and Max Range. The car always defaults to Comfort upon startup. In Sport mode, the car offers the most dynamic performance, with more power available off the line and more direct steering response.

财神加持「发财金」、金库能量「开运水」，台新银行猪年加码送客户好财运。台新银行特别准备经庙宇诵经加持的「发财金」赠送客户，为新开户或财富管理客户提供「开运水」和「发财金」。

在农历春节即将到来之际，一般民众除了办年货、大扫除外，也会参考民间习俗，在家中摆放吉祥物，以希望来年带来好运与财富。根据民间习俗，银行象征聚财，水则代表财，因此，许多人在春节前会去银行取水回家摆放，期待新的一年累积好财气。

近年来，国内多家银行为迎接春节会准备「发财水」赠送客户，这样贴心的安排深受民众欢迎。台新银行更根据民众需求，与大洋金币合作提供系列金银纪念币，以服务高认知度的生肖主题纪念币需求。

史筱平副总经理建议，民众可将「开运水」放在家中财位，或在第48天享用，也可倒入家中饮水设备与家人共享，帮助全家人一年的好运和财富。这些特殊造型金银币能满足民众多元的收藏需求，包括猪年金银币、扇形金银纪念套币以及彩色金银币，都是迎接金猪年的特别选择。

Smart contracts are agreements between two or more parties that are automatically enforced without trusted intermediaries. They have been reinvented by blockchain technologies, which provide trustless environments where smart contracts are embodied as computer programs. However, writing secure smart contracts is challenging, as evidenced by numerous attacks on smart contracts platforms, notably Ethereum. Since smart contracts control assets, any bugs in them can directly lead to financial losses.

Algorand is a late-generation blockchain that incorporates a set of interesting features, including high scalability and a no-forking consensus protocol based on Proof-of-Stake. Its smart contract layer, known as ASC1, aims to mitigate smart contract risks. It adopts a non-Turing-complete programming model, natively supporting atomic sets of transactions and user-defined assets. These features make it an intriguing smart contract platform to study.

The official specification and documentation of ASC1 consist of English prose and a set of templates to assist programmers in designing their contracts. This approach conforms to standard industry practices, but it has two notable drawbacks.

Le cycliste basque de 32 ans, originaire de Guipuscoa, s'engage pour une saison avec l'équipe française Cofidis. Recruté pour viser les classements généraux, il constituera également un renfort de choix pour Guillaume Martin en montagne.

Triple champion d'Espagne et vainqueur d'étapes dans chacun des trois Grands Tours (Tour de France, Vuelta, Giro), Ion Izagirre, natif d'Ormaiztegi en Gipuscoa, a signé pour une saison avec Cofidis. C'est une belle acquisition pour l'équipe, qui accueille un coureur polyvalent, au profil de grimpeur, capable de soutenir Guillaume Martin lors de certaines courses et de tenir le rôle de leader dans d'autres compétitions. Depuis 2019, Izagirre évoluait au sein de l'équipe Astana.

« Je suis particulièrement heureux de rejoindre Cofidis. Changer d’équipe, c’est toujours une sensation particulière : on sait que tout sera nouveau et qu’il faut recréer ses automatismes. J’ai la chance d’avoir de bons amis chez Cofidis, comme Bingen (Fernandez) et les frères Herrada. C’est une équipe française, mais je crois qu’elle est aussi un peu espagnole ! », a déclaré Izagirre, qui portera pour la première fois de sa carrière le maillot d’une équipe française.

Franco Smith, le nouvel entraîneur intérimaire du XV d'Italie, alignera le demi de mêlée inexpérimenté Callum Braley pour ses débuts samedi au pays de Galles dans le Tournoi des Six Nations. Le joueur de Gloucester, âgé de 25 ans et comptant cinq sélections avec les Azzurri, sera associé à Tommaso Allan (26 ans, 54 sélections) à l'ouverture, samedi au Principality Stadium de Cardiff (15h15). Comme prévu, le talonneur Luca Bigi, âgé de 29 ans et totalisant 24 sélections, portera le brassard de capitaine. Il sera soutenu à gauche par l'expérimenté Andrea Lovotti (30 ans, 40 sélections), et à droite par Giosué Zilocchi (23 ans, 2 sélections), qui fera ses débuts dans le Tournoi.

Colusa County High School seniors have a new resource for financial literacy in the form of the book "How to Adult – Personal Finance for the Real World," authored by Jake Cousineau, a Colusa High School graduate from the class of 2005.

"I wrote this book because I saw a gap in accessible financial resources tailored for young adults," Cousineau explained. "Seeing the positive impact it had on my students convinced me that financial education is not only crucial but also teachable. I hope the lessons in this book empower others to navigate the financial challenges of adulthood."

Covering a range of topics from compound interest and mutual funds to Roth IRAs and insurance deductibles, the book was made possible through a partnership between the Colusa County Office of Education and Tri-Counties Bank.

"Tri Counties Bank is proud to support Jake's initiative," stated Daniel Bailey, Executive Vice President of Tri Counties Bank. "As a community-driven financial institution, we recognize the value of the financial knowledge shared in this book, which is vital for young adults. It is a pleasure for us to make sure that every graduating senior in Colusa County receives a copy."

Currently, Cousineau teaches Personal Finance at La Reina High School and Middle School in Thousand Oaks, CA.

"I am personally proud of Jake Cousineau, a fellow Colusa High School graduate and the author of 'How to Adult – Personal Finance for the Real World'," expressed Michael West. "I am grateful to Daniel Bailey and Tri Counties Bank for partnering with Jake to provide this valuable resource to all Colusa County high school seniors, free of charge for the current year and the next three years."

The book is available for purchase on Amazon.

شهدت أبوظبي، اليوم السبت، وضع حجر الأساس لأول معبد هندوسي، والذي سيقام في منطقة بومريخة على طريق أبو ظبي دبي. وأكد الدكتور مغير الخييلي، في كلمته خلال الحفل، أن وضع حجر أساس لمعبد هندوسي في أبو ظبي، يعكس عمق العلاقة بين دولة الإمارات العربية المتحدة، وجمهورية الهند، ويبعث رسالة سلام من هذه المنطقة إلى العالم أجمع.
وجاء الافتتاح في حضور رئيس الطائفة الهندوسية في الهند، قداسة ماهاني سوامي مهراجا، ووزير التغيير المناخي والبيئة الإماراتي، الدكتور ثاني بن أحمد الزيودي، ووزير الدولة للتعليم العالي، الدكتور أحمد بالهول الفلاسي، ورئيس دائرة تنمية المجتمع بأبوظبي، الدكتور مغير الخييلي، والسفير الهندي في الإمارات، نفديب سينغ سوري، والآلاف من الجالية الهندية في أبو ظبي، وذلك بحسب صحيفة "الإمارات اليوم".
وأشاد رئيس الطائفة الهندوسية بالإمارات، كعاصمة عالمية للتسامح والمحبة تلك المبادرة، في إطار تعزيز الدور العالمي الذي تلعبه الدولة كعاصمة للتعايش والتلاقي الحضاري. وأوضح أن هذه المبادرة تمثل امتدادا حقيقيا للقيم التي أرساها ورسخها في وجدان أمته، القائد الراحل، الشيخ زايد بن سلطان آل نهيان.
من جانبه، أكد السفير الهندي في الإمارات، نفديب سينغ سوري، أن بناء معبد هندوسي في إمارة أبوظبي، يعكس التزامها الراسخ بتعزيز قيم ومبادئ التسامح، كواحدة من أكثر دول العالم تنوعا، والتي تعد موطنا لكل الأديان.

标题：越南版的亚马逊？马山集团的未来

作者：潘西邦

2019年底，马山集团从Vin集团手中收购了零售部门VinCommerce的控股权，这一决定令许多投资者感到不解。毕竟，在越南的消费品市场中，零售商的毛利率通常比制造商低约25%。而马山集团在调味料和快速消费品制造领域早已是市场的领军者，为什么还要从制造业进军零售业呢？

然而，仔细观察便会发现，马山集团专注于发展现代化的零售渠道。旗下的Winmart、Winmart+（前称为Vinmart）、Phuc Long（福隆咖啡）等店面都强调为顾客提供便利。马山集团更邀请阿里巴巴入股，开启了与东南亚最大电商平台Lazada的合作，将消费品上架网络，并结合实体店的取货服务，将顾客便利性提升至最大化。

根据市场调研公司Nielsen的数据，越南的传统零售渠道（包括杂货店和传统市场）仍占74%的市场份额，而现代零售渠道仅占26%，但后者以每年12%的速度迅速增长。2020年尽管是零售市场艰难的一年，越南电商销售额仍增长了18%，达到120亿美元，与之相比，越南整体零售增长率仅为7%，总规模为1730亿美元。

现代化零售渠道的快速增长以及零售业与制造业之间毛利率差距的逐渐缩小，是马山集团大力投资零售渠道的重要原因。2018年的数据显示，在美国，零售业的毛利率比制造业低10%；在泰国则低7%；而在越南，这一差距为25%。马山集团管理层相信，这一差距将在未来十年内大幅缩小，甚至比国外缩减的速度更快。随着消费者可支配收入的转移，马山集团在零售业中的消费者钱包份额预计将从目前的1%大幅增长至25%。

另一个重要原因是，从产品研发、品牌建设到最终销售给消费者的整个信息链，将为马山带来巨大收益。马山集团通过旗下子公司CrownX同时控股消费品制造和零售业务。通过Winmart零售店收集客户反馈，CrownX能够将这些信息分享给旗下的消费品制造部门，增强其在产品研发和品牌建设方面的能力。马山集团在拥有超过30万个传统销售渠道的基础上，整合了近2500个现代化零售点和Lazada电商平台，正逐渐成为搅动零售市场的一股强大力量。

越南版的亚马逊？

由此看来，马山集团发展现代化零售渠道的潜力显而易见。然而，它同样大力投资电商，这难道仅仅是另一个赌注？尽管越南电商行业发展迅速，许多专业电商平台仍在亏损阶段，且亏损不断扩大。这导致越南一些零售业巨头对电商持保守态度，如移动世界控股和富润珠宝，专注于实体店面的扩充和优化，对电商销售增长没有过多期待。

根据越南电商协会（VECOM）的数据，电商目前主要在胡志明市和河内发展，占总市场的70%。

نادي أبوظبي للرياضات الشراعية واليخوت أعلن عن استطلاع هيئة الأرصاد الجوية غداً الخميس لهلال سباق دلما التاريخي، تحت رعاية سمو الشيخ حمدان بن زايد آل نهيان، ممثل الحاكم في منطقة الظفرة. ينظم النادي السباق بالتعاون مع لجنة إدارة المهرجانات والبرامج الثقافية والتراثية في أبوظبي، حيث ستحدد هيئة الأرصاد موعد إقامة السباق بين 18 و22 من الشهر الجاري حسب الأحوال الجوية.

تم الإعلان عن مشاركة 102 محمل شراعي في السباق بعد إغلاق باب التسجيل واعتماد الأسماء المقدمة وفق الشروط الخاصة بالسباق. عقد النادي اجتماعاً مع نواخذة المحامل قبل يومين، بحضور ماجد عتيق المهيري، المدير التنفيذي لنادي أبوظبي للرياضات الشراعية واليخوت، وسعيد المهيري، مدير الإدارة الفنية بمجلس أبوظبي الرياضي، عبر تقنية الاتصال المرئي. تم مناقشة كافة الأمور المتعلقة بالسباق والرد على أسئلة البحارة بشكل تفصيلي.

اتفق الحضور على تطبيق الإجراءات الاحترازية المتبعة للحد من انتشار فيروس كورونا بدقة، وتطبيق عقوبات على المخالفين. كما تم الاتفاق على كافة الأمور الفنية، بما في ذلك تركيب جهاز تتبع في كل محمل والتأكيد على وجوده لتأمين سلامة البحارة، والالتزام التام بخط سير السباق الذي يقدر بحوالي 125 كلم من جزيرة دلما التاريخية مروراً بست جزر وصولاً لخط النهاية بمدينة المرفأ.

سيتم احتساب نتائج المشاركين الذين يتنافسون على جوائز بقيمة 25 مليون درهم وثلاث سيارات حسب ترتيب المرور من بوابة العبور الأخيرة. أبدى الحضور تعاوناً كبيراً في كافة الاشتراطات، وتعاهد النواخذة على الالتزام التام بكل التفاصيل والتعليمات التي تصدرها اللجنة المنظمة.

Título: Detención de Diputado del PRM en Miami por Presunto Narcotráfico

Por: José Morón / Color Visión

El Show del Mediodía, transmitido en vivo por Color Visión, presenta un informe especial sobre la reciente detención de Miguel Gutiérrez Díaz, un legislador del Partido Revolucionario Moderno (PRM). Este martes por la mañana, Gutiérrez Díaz fue arrestado en un aeropuerto de Miami, acusado de presunta implicación con el narcotráfico.

Neoen confirme son objectif d'EBITDA 2020 compris entre 270 et 300 millions d'euros (à taux de change constants par rapport à 2019), et prévoit désormais une marge d'EBITDA supérieure à 80%. Le groupe rappelle que cet objectif d'EBITDA tient compte de la meilleure estimation à date du calendrier de mise en service des centrales en cours de construction, ainsi que du niveau des prix de marché actuels. Neoen précise également que cet objectif prend en compte la forte progression de l'activité de stockage au premier trimestre 2020 et repose sur l'hypothèse d'une poursuite de la production à un niveau normal de la centrale de El Llano au Mexique jusqu'à la fin de l'année.

Le chiffre d'affaires consolidé de Neoen s'est élevé à 157,2 millions d'euros au premier semestre 2020, en progression de 33% par rapport au premier semestre 2019. À taux de change constants, il a augmenté de 35%. Cette croissance s'explique principalement par la contribution des actifs mis en service au cours de l'année 2019 et du premier semestre 2020. Elle résulte également de la forte progression du chiffre d'affaires de l'activité de stockage au premier trimestre liée à des conditions spécifiques et non récurrentes en Australie.

Neoen confirme par ailleurs son objectif de plus de 5 GW de capacité en opération ou en construction à la fin de l'année 2021, capacité qui sera pleinement opérationnelle fin 2022. Neoen réitère également son objectif d'EBITDA supérieur à 400 millions d'euros en 2022. Ces objectifs tiennent également compte de la meilleure estimation à date du calendrier d'exécution de ses projets.

El próximo 27 de junio se llevará a cabo la jornada electoral en Jujuy. Diez frentes se inscribieron para participar y el espacio liderado por Daniel Macias, sin alianzas partidarias, se prepara para formar parte de los comicios.

Se han confirmado los diez frentes que competirán en las elecciones de Jujuy el 27 de junio. Además, se suma a la contienda el partido "UNIR mi JUJUY", que va por fuera de los sectores oficialistas y opositores. Con su propia lista, el espacio encabezado a nivel local por Daniel Macias buscará pelear en los comicios con propuestas innovadoras y caras nuevas.

"UNIR mi JUJUY" se presenta como un partido consolidado, ya que ha participado en las elecciones de 2015, 2017 y 2019. Cuenta con referentes en diferentes municipios y comisiones municipales, y a nivel nacional forma parte del frente Juntos por el Cambio. Este espacio representa lo que los jujeños necesitan en términos de propuestas superadoras, con un enfoque renovado y con ideas que impactarán en la calidad de vida de las familias de toda la provincia, poniendo especial atención en los trabajadores y la juventud de Jujuy, según destacaron sus referentes.

Es importante mencionar que los candidatos de las diferentes listas serán presentados hasta el 8 de mayo y confirmados hasta el 12 del mismo mes, de acuerdo con el cronograma electoral de la provincia.

En cuanto a las elecciones, el 27 de junio se elegirán 24 diputados provinciales y también se renovarán los Concejos Deliberantes y Comisiones Municipales.

Los frentes ya están definidos, siendo en total diez, además de un partido que participará sin formar parte de ninguno de ellos: "UNIR mi JUJUY". Este espacio se encuentra definiendo a sus candidatos en estos momentos.

**Revised Text:**

In the era of data-driven decision-making, Federated Learning (FL) has emerged as a pivotal technology, enabling collaborative model training across multiple devices while preserving data privacy. This approach not only enhances user privacy but also facilitates the utilization of decentralized data sources, making it a cornerstone for the next generation of machine learning applications, such as medical image processing, recommendation systems, and edge computing.

Despite its potential, FL faces critical challenges in achieving uniform model performance and generalization, particularly when dealing with non-independent and identically distributed (non-iid) data across different clients. This heterogeneity in data distribution leads to significant disparities in local model performance, as the local objective functions diverge from the global objective, pushing the aggregated global model away from the optimal solution. The non-iid problem is not only theoretical but exists in many real-world applications, potentially compromising the efficacy of FL systems.

To mitigate these issues, several strategies have been proposed. Initial attempts focused on enhancing local model training to better align with the global objective. Methods such as parameter sharing and characteristics sharing of data have been explored to bridge the gap between local and global models. While these approaches aim to enrich local models with broader insights, they inherently increase communication costs and raise privacy concerns, as they necessitate additional data or metadata exchange across the network. Moreover, some researchers have focused on applying generalization theories, proposing that enhancing the generalization capability of local models could indirectly address the non-iid challenge. Yet, without direct access to knowledge of the global data distribution, these generalization efforts often fall short, providing limited improvements in overall model performance.

In response to these limitations, the concept of utilizing the global model as a teaching mechanism for local models has gained attention. This approach leverages the more generalized nature of the global model, aiming to guide local training without the direct exchange of data. However, the effectiveness of such knowledge transfer is markedly reduced in the presence of imbalanced local data distributions. Moreover, initializing local models with the global model's parameters can inadvertently lead to the loss of generalization ability over time, akin to the forgetting phenomenon observed in continuous learning systems.

This study delves into one of the most significant challenges—the phenomenon of model forgetting in the context of non-iid data distribution. Model forgetting, particularly for local models in an FL setup, is often considered a degradation in the ability to accurately predict underrepresented classes over time. Our investigation reveals that the core of the forgetting issue is primarily rooted in the skewed distribution of local data, where certain classes are represented by fewer samples than others. Such an imbalance leads to insufficient 'positive feedback' during the training process, meaning that the model does not receive enough reinforcement to accurately learn and retain information about these sparsely represented classes.

Figure 1 illustrates the effects of imbalanced class distribution on gradient updates within an FL context, using the ResNet-18 architecture trained on CIFAR10 dataset variations. We observe the model's performance across four different training scenarios: 's1' and 's3' datasets, which include all classes, and 's2' and 's4' datasets, from which class 3 and 9 are removed intentionally to simulate imbalanced class distribution. The analysis of gradients—specifically, how they change in response to the absence or presence of certain classes—reveals that removing classes leads to significant shifts in the model's learning focus. This is depicted through divergent gradient updates for classes 3 and 9, indicating the model's 'forgetting' or loss of ability to generalize to those classes that became underrepresented or absent in the training data.

Following the initial observations, our investigation delves deeper into the mechanisms behind these shifts in learning focus. By analyzing the probability outputs for each class before and after training on both balanced ('s1', 's3') and imbalanced ('s2', 's4') datasets as shown in Figure 2, we gain insights into how the model's predictive confidence is affected by the presence or absence of certain classes. This analysis not only confirms the impact of imbalanced datasets on the learning process but also underscores the necessity of addressing this challenge to prevent the degradation of model generalization in FL environments.

To address the issue of imbalanced class distribution, we propose a new learning framework, FedDistill.

Contemporary machine learning (ML) researchers primarily utilize high-level programming languages and frameworks in their studies. Python stands as the predominant programming language in ML, leading to the widespread adoption of frameworks like PyTorch and TensorFlow, often paired with NumPy. This paper seeks to investigate the statistical quality, reproducibility, energy consumption, and time efficiency of pseudo-random number generation within these technologies, an area with sparse existing literature.

By default, Python employs the Mersenne Twister (MT) algorithm (Matsumoto & Nishimura, 1998). Similarly, TensorFlow and PyTorch default to the Philox algorithm for PRNG, with the option of using Threefry from the same family of secure generators (Salmon et al., 2011). NumPy offers a range of PRNGs, providing greater flexibility. The default PRNG algorithm in NumPy is PCG (O'Neill, 2014). For this study, we compare the reproducibility, performance, statistical quality, and energy consumption of the following PRNGs: MT, Philox, PCG, and Mrg32k3a (L'Ecuyer, 1999) as a reference, using the original C implementations from the PRNG authors.

Philox, Threefry, and ARS algorithms were introduced by Salmon et al. at the 2011 Supercomputing Conference. These algorithms integrate cryptographic techniques similar to AES (Daemen & Rijmen, 2000). While slower due to their cryptographic nature, they exhibit commendable statistical properties despite some reproducibility challenges (Li, 2012). MRG32k3a, devised by L'Ecuyer in 1999, excels in statistical testing against TestU01, a comprehensive statistical test battery for PRNGs (L'ecuyer & Simard, 2007). PCG, developed by O'Neill in 2014, is known for its superior statistical attributes but lacked confirmation through a comprehensive TestU01 evaluation.

To assess PRNG quality, statistical evaluations are crucial for distinguishing superior generators. Tests such as those introduced by Knuth in "The Art of Computer Programming" and Die Hard by Marsaglia provide benchmarks for PRNG evaluations (Knuth, 1973; Marsaglia, 1996). The NIST Statistical Test Suite and TestU01, developed by L'Ecuyer and Simard, are widely regarded for evaluating random number generators, crucial in cryptographic applications.

Efficient PRNGs are essential in the context of ML due to the significant impact on time and energy consumption. Improving computational efficiency is crucial for training complex models, particularly given the current emphasis on environmental sustainability. PRNGs influence reproducibility, a cornerstone of scientific integrity in ML research, ensuring consistent results across runs for validation and model reliability.

This paper aims to address several key questions related to PRNG implementation in ML frameworks, statistical quality, performance, energy consumption, and numerical consistency. The discussion will encompass a review of prior research, our experimental methodology, findings on time performance, energy consumption, and numerical reproducibility, concluding with implications and future research directions.

The face on Mars was not created by aliens because there is no life on Mars. The face looked like an alien artifact because the images were not sharp, so you couldn't see that the face was just equivalent to a butte or mesa.

Some people think that the face on Mars was created by aliens. However, the face is just another one of Mars' mesas or buttes.

Esta semana comienza a definirse el plantel de la selección uruguaya para la Copa América de Brasil 2019. Aunque la lista de convocados aún no se ha hecho pública, ya hay ocho futbolistas entrenando bajo las órdenes del cuerpo técnico liderado por el Maestro Óscar Tabárez.

Los jugadores que ya se encuentran entrenando son Diego Godín, Josema Giménez, Federico Valverde, Gastón Pereiro, Maxi Gómez, Jonathan Rodríguez, Martín Silva y Sebastián Coates. Este último llegó el lunes.

Se espera que varios seleccionados arriben entre este martes y miércoles, una vez finalizada la temporada con sus respectivos clubes este fin de semana. Tal como ocurrió con Coates, quien se presentó el lunes en el predio de la Asociación Uruguaya de Fútbol tras coronarse campeón con el Sporting de Portugal el sábado, se espera que los que jugaron el domingo lleguen el martes.

Por la mañana se sumarán Nicolás Lodeiro, Mathías Suárez, Matías Vecino, Fernando Muslera y Rodrigo Bentancur. Por la tarde, se integrarán Marcelo Saracchi, Martín Cáceres y Diego Laxalt.

Edinson Cavani también terminó su temporada en París Saint Germain el pasado viernes, jugando los 90 minutos en la derrota 3-1 ante Reims. Aún no hay fecha confirmada para su arribo al Complejo.

¿Qué sucede con Luis Suárez y Cristhian Stuani? Suárez fue sometido a una artroscopia en su rodilla derecha el 9 de mayo y se está recuperando en Barcelona. Se espera que se sume a la selección el lunes 3 de junio. Por su parte, Stuani sufrió una lesión muscular en un gemelo el 10 de mayo y está en plena recuperación.

**Jugadores que aún están en actividad:**

Entre los habituales convocados por Tabárez, algunos jugadores siguen activos en la Liga Europa, la Copa Sudamericana, el fútbol argentino y el brasileño. 

Uno de ellos es Lucas Torreira, quien disputará la final de la Europa League con el Arsenal frente al Chelsea este miércoles en Bakú, Azerbaiyán.

En la Copa Sudamericana, los futbolistas de Independiente de Avellaneda, Martín Campaña y Gastón Silva, jugarán este martes en Buenos Aires ante Rionegro Águilas de Colombia, tras haber perdido 3-2 en el partido de ida en Colombia.

En el fútbol argentino, Nahitan Nandez jugó este fin de semana el partido de vuelta de las semifinales de la Copa de la Superliga, en el cual su equipo, Boca Juniors, superó a Argentinos Juniors. Aunque Boca se clasificó a la final, Nandez llegó al límite de amarillas y se perderá la definición ante Tigre el próximo domingo. Tras el partido, el jugador declaró que no se perderá la final en Córdoba y que viajará con el plantel.

"You realize what this means, don't you?" A shadowy figure spoke from its perch ten feet above Commander Uzyk. "Humanity at large is losing hope. The outer walls of the Sanctum fell last month, and even the citadel cannot hope to survive long. And with this news -"

"I acknowledge that the situation is dire," she replied, "but -"

"No. There is no other alternative. When the existence of life itself is threatened, those with the means to act must do so."

"Who said that? Hitler?"

"Who?"

"Sorry. I used to read the ancient histories." She shuddered as an explosion far away rocked the ground underneath her. Crates of food and weapons crashed to the ground, and the failing fluorescent lights flickered a few times more. "Listen, the Council will never stand for your solution. And neither will I. We will fight to the death, but we won't sacrifice our principles."

The shapeless form laughed harshly. "You think your moral stand will be remembered for all of time. But who will do the remembering?" It leaped from the outcropping in the wall and stood next to her, still no more solid. "I will do this with or without your approval. Do not get in my way."

It strode to a small door in the wall, and began pressing buttons on a keypad. As it did so, Uzyk scrabbled around on the floor, at last grasping a discarded bottle of some substance. She turned it over and read the date: 10/02/151441. "It reads today," she spat. "This is the last one. Our final hope. It's dead and gone. As are we all."

The darkness turned towards her for a moment, and it seemed to almost pity her, before pressing a final button. The door swung open, revealing --

A storeroom packed with thousands of containers labeled "Corn Syrup."

Uzyk gasped and fell to her knees. Shaking, she drew a gun from her belt and aimed it unsteadily at the blackness. "You have doomed us all," she murmured. "It is time to embrace the new way, Commander.

市长白思豪(Bill de Blasio)和小商业服务局局长多瑞斯(Jonnel Doris)日前宣布，市府将成立三个小商业指导项目，邀请行业专家帮助受到疫情重创的小商业者在后疫情时代站稳脚步，发展业务。预计今年将惠及1500个小商业者。（市长办公室提供）

这三个项目分别是小商业导师项目(Small Business Mentors)、少数族裔及女性企业导师项目(M/WBE Mentors)和非裔小商业者导师项目(BE NYC Mentors)。其中，小商业导师项目主要为少数族裔社区的户外经营商家服务，该项目由市长族裔包容与平等办公室提出，将为小商业者提供定制化指导和职场人脉，并邀请了14名在疫情中经营成功的小商业者作为导师。

少数族裔及女性企业导师项目将帮助相关企业建立资源网络，拓宽获取资源的渠道，并提供更多合同机会。非裔小商业者导师项目则将帮助还未起步或刚成立的非裔小商业者站稳脚步，同时推动更多非裔小商业者进入高增长行业。

Matt Park, Diana Oh, Ryan McCurdy, and Rocky Vega in "{my lingerie play}" at Rattlestick Playwrights Theater. (Photo by Jeremy Daniel)

Only three months after the late activist Edith Windsor's 2013 victory for gay rights at the Supreme Court, which led to the national legalization of same-sex marriage, The New York Times ran an article questioning the resolve of queer theatres to evolve with the times.

"At a time of rapid change in the gay rights movement, from marriage to the military, the purpose of a strictly gay theatre company isn't the same as it was 10 years ago," remarked Times contributor Erik Piepenburg. The writer observed a general decline in interest in LGBTQ topics and a subsequent drop in revenues and taste at gay-specific companies. The logical result? Queer theatre companies were opting for lighter, campier fare, Piepenburg wrote, to keep their audiences happy.

Underlying this high-profile conclusion is the anxiety that queer theatre cannot survive the shifting tides of public opinion. Without antipathy, is there just apathy? Without something to fight against, does the once edgy avant-garde of queer theatre disappear?

Elsewhere, critics have eviscerated a handful of once-classic gay works as shallow, dated excursions. Reflecting on the autumn 2016 season, The New Yorker's Hilton Als wrote a particularly brutal assessment of William Finn and James Lapine's Broadway revival of Falsettos.

WASHINGTON—A gun control rally scheduled later this month in DC cannot take place at the National Mall as the location was already booked for a talent show. Mike Litterst, a spokesman for the National Park Service, informed The Washington Post that the organizers of the "March For Our Lives" event had applied for a space that had already been reserved, prompting them to seek an alternative venue.

The advancement of technology has significantly benefited humanity in various ways, such as through computers, phones, and even planes for global travel. One promising area of technological advancement is facial recognition, which could greatly assist students in their learning processes. This technology has the potential to enhance students' understanding of the material, introduce new ideas regarding career opportunities, and improve their focus on their work.

Facial recognition technology in the classroom could help students comprehend their material better by adapting lessons based on their expressions of confusion, boredom, or distraction. For students who struggle with subjects like math or English, such adaptability would be immensely beneficial. For instance, a classroom computer could detect when a student is becoming confused or bored, and then, like an effective human instructor, modify the lesson accordingly. By tailoring the lesson to the student, the likelihood of passing a class and graduating from high school or college could increase. For example, if the student seems confused, the lesson could slow down, providing the necessary time to work through the problem, whereas, if the student appears engaged, the lesson could be accelerated, presenting more challenging material.

قرر اللواء جمال عوض، رئيس مجلس إدارة الهيئة القومية للتأمين الاجتماعي، بناءً على توجيهات الرئيس عبدالفتاح السيسي وبالتنسيق مع الدكتورة نيفين القباج، وزيرة التضامن الاجتماعي، إتاحة صرف كافة المعاشات لشهر أغسطس في ماكينات الصراف الآلي، والتي تبلغ أكثر من 13 ألف ماكينة، غدا الخميس الموافق 23 يوليو، تيسيراً على أصحاب المعاشات قبل عيد الأضحى المبارك.

فيما أكد رئيس الهيئة القومية للتأمين الاجتماعي، ضرورة اتباع أصحاب المعاشات والقائمين بالصرف لكافة الإجراءات الاحترازية وتعليمات الوقاية حفاظاً على صحتهم. وشدد على ضرورة اتباع القواعد المنظمة لعملية الصرف لتجنب التكدسات في منافذ الصرف ومكاتب البريد.

وأوضح رئيس الهيئة أنه تقرر فتح منافذ الهيئة القومية للتأمين الاجتماعي غدا، على الرغم من كونه يوم إجازة رسمية، وذلك بشكل استثنائي لخدمة أصحاب المعاشات. حيث يبدأ صرف شريحة أصحاب المعاشات الذين يحصلون على أقل من ألف جنيه قبل زيادة يوليو، ويبلغ عددهم 2.4 مليون قائم بالصرف، غدا، من منافذ الهيئة ومكاتب البريد.

وسيتم صرف المعاشات لأصحاب المعاشات الذين يحصلون على أقل من ألفي جنيه ويبلغ عددهم حوالي 2.4 مليون قائم بالصرف قبل زيادة يوليو 2020، يومي الأحد والاثنين من منافذ الهيئة ومكاتب البريد.

كما سيتم صرف باقي المعاشات مهما كانت قيمتها يومي الثلاثاء والأربعاء من منافذ الهيئة ومكاتب البريد.

وقد أعدت الهيئة القومية للتأمين الاجتماعي كافة الاستعدادات الضرورية لصرف معاشات شهر أغسطس، قبل عيد الأضحى المبارك، لأكثر من 8 ملايين صاحب معاش.

Paramount Plus se está preparando con nuevos proyectos para competir con otras plataformas de streaming y ahora agregará a su catálogo series originales que contarán con la participación de actores reconocidos como Demián Bichir y Diego Boneta, este último se ha hecho popular con "Luis Miguel, la serie" de Netflix.

La productora anunció que será a partir del tercer trimestre del año cuando "La gran ola" y "At Midnight" estén disponibles en el catálogo, proyectos en los que participa Diego Boneta; la primera es una serie y la segunda una película de corte romántico.

Además, Demián Bichir está trabajando con Paramount Plus para dirigir y producir la serie "Adaptación de JG Ballar", proyecto que marcará su debut en esta plataforma, que ya está buscando la forma de ofrecer un contenido atractivo para los televidentes.

En el caso de Diego Boneta, "La gran ola" es una serie biográfica basada en la vida del surfista mexicano Carlos "Coco" Nogales, considerado uno de los mejores del mundo, en la que Boneta interpretará sus difíciles comienzos en la Ciudad de México, hasta sus días de fama y gloria.

Mientras que en la película "At Midnight", el actor será el protagonista de una comedia romántica en la que dos jóvenes deciden no enamorarse. El filme está producido por Three Amigos, de Boneta, junto con Fred Berger ("La La Land", 2016) y Teorema, la empresa de Michel Franco ("Nuevo orden", 2020) y Eréndira Núñez Larios, entre otros.

La lista de próximos estrenos asciende a los 20 títulos, entre los que también se suma Demián Bichir ("Godzilla vs. Kong", 2021) como actor, productor y director en "Adaptación de JG Ballar", una serie escrita por el periodista mexicano Juan Villoro.

Esta serie sigue la historia de amor de Ted y Alice mientras retrata la violencia y el peligro que enfrentan los periodistas día a día al cubrir la guerra contra el narcotráfico en México y Estados Unidos, sin duda, una trama interesante que tendrá mucho del contexto real.

La lista también incluye la serie "Cecilia", protagonizada por Treviño ("Club de Cuervos", 2015) y "Dr. Ballí", una serie documental realizada por el periodista y documentalista Diego Enrique Osorno, basada en la vida de Alfredo Ballí, un médico de Monterrey condenado por haber asesinado a su esposa.

Entre las producciones brasileñas que se anunciaron se encuentra "Río Shore", que reproduce el formato de "Jersey Shore" en Estados Unidos y "Acapulco Shore" en México, así como la serie "Adriano el Emperador" y "Las seguidoras".

Logical reasoning has long been a crucial and persistent challenge in artificial intelligence (Russell and Norvig, 2010). A logical reasoning system is capable of deriving new facts by applying known rules to known facts and determining the truth value of a given hypothesis; see Figure 1 for an example. Traditionally, building reasoning systems has been heavily reliant on formal logic. However, with the advent of pretrained large language models (LMs), efforts have shifted towards leveraging these models to handle natural language statements for multi-step logical reasoning; see section 5 for a summary.

In this paper, we introduce LEAP, the first LM-based logical reasoning system that incorporates explicit planning during inference. Our system actively searches through known facts, identifying those that are relevant, and performs multiple rounds of deduction to ascertain the truth value of a statement. During each round, the planning process anticipates future outcomes of possible reasoning decisions—selecting relevant facts and determining what deductions to make—to maximize the likelihood of discovering a valid proof for the statement in question.

Planning is a fundamental aspect of intelligent behavior, characterized by the ability to use foresight to inform decision-making processes and achieve desirable outcomes. This concept has been instrumental in various artificial intelligence methodologies. For instance, minimax-style game playing anticipates potential replies and counter-replies between players (assuming optimal play) (Russell and Norvig, 2010). Similarly, model-based reinforcement learning leverages environment models to simulate action responses and uses these simulated experiences to learn value functions (e.g., Dyna, Monte-Carlo tree search) (Sutton and Barto, 2018). In natural language processing, planning has been employed to enable language models to generate utterances meeting complex constraints (Lu et al., 2022a).

The inclusion of planning is particularly significant for logical reasoning. By evaluating future outcomes of decisions, a planning-based system can concentrate on genuinely useful (both given and deduced) facts at an early stage, increasing its chances of success. Moreover, a planning-based reasoning system is generally more interpretable, making it more applicable in user-centric and safety-critical scenarios. Planning provides clarity by showing "what will happen after—and that is why—I select these known facts and deduce this particular new fact from them," which is more informative than merely stating "I select these and deduce this." Notably, none of the previous LM-based systems have utilized explicit planning during inference.

Despite its advantages, planning in logical reasoning presents challenges. A verification mechanism is needed to assess the quality of each potential proof.

تتعرض العديد من النساء خلال فترات الحمل للإجهاض المتكرر وعدم اكتمال نمو الجنين، مما قد يحطم حلم الأمومة الذي يتمناه العديد من النساء. 

من جانبه، أوضح الدكتور أحمد عاصم الملا، استشاري الحقن المجهري والمناظير النسائية وعلاج العقم، خلال بيان صحفي، أن هناك عدة أسباب تؤدي لسقوط الجنين قبل اكتمال نموه، وتؤدي إلى الإجهاض المتكرر. وتتمثل هذه الأسباب في:

1. الأسباب التشريحية التي تمثل 10-15% من أسباب الإجهاض المتكرر، مثل الرحم الطفلي، والرحم ذو القرن أو القرنين، والحجاب الرحمي، والورم الليفي في الرحم.

2. اضطرابات وظائف الغدد والخلل الهرموني التي تشكل 10-15% من الأسباب، مثل مرض السكري، وتكيس المبايض، واضطرابات الغدة الدرقية، ونقص إفراز البروجسترون من الجسم الأصفر أو المشيمة.

3. الأسباب المتعلقة بجهاز المناعة والتي تصل نسبتها إلى 5% من الأسباب. إذا كان هناك أي خلل في نظام المناعة لدى الأم، يُعتبر الجنين جسماً غريباً يجب مهاجمته ومحاربته، مما يؤدي في النهاية إلى الإجهاض المتكرر.

La Porsche N.1, en tête des 24 Heures du Mans dimanche depuis une dizaine d’heures, a subi un tournant décisif. Elle s’est arrêtée en piste à 11h41 (09h41 GMT), victime d’un problème moteur, et a dû abandonner à 03h19 de la fin de la course. Cet événement inattendu a eu lieu après les abandons de deux Toyota dans la nuit, marquant un incroyable rebondissement pour cette 85e édition.

À 11h10 (09h10 GMT), la Porsche N.1 d’André Lotterer a soudainement commencé à rouler au ralenti à sept kilomètres des stands, avant de s’immobiliser brièvement et de repartir sur le même rythme. À 11h21 (09h21 GMT), elle s’est arrêtée dans une montée avant le freinage du golf de Mulsanne. André Lotterer, le pilote, a quitté le véhicule et s’est assis en sanglots derrière les barrières de sécurité, signifiant ainsi l’abandon de la voiture.

Cet abandon crucial permet à la deuxième Porsche, la N.2, de se positionner désormais en 3e position, à deux tours du nouveau leader, une LMP2. Il s’agit de l’Oreca-Gibson N.38 de l’écurie Jackie Chan DC Racing, qui a confié le volant au jeune Français de 19 ans, Thomas Laurent, participant pour la première fois aux 24 Heures du Mans.

Ce nouvel abandon de la Porsche N.1 signifie qu’au moins une LMP2 sera sur le podium. Quant à la dernière Toyota rescapée, la N.8, elle se trouve à 9 tours de la Porsche N.2, en 10e position.
Le Zamalek SC a publié mardi la liste des joueurs sélectionnés pour le quart de finale retour de la Ligue des Champions africaine contre l'Espérance de Tunis, qui se déroulera vendredi à Radès à 20h.

Unsupervised visual representation learning has gained significant research attention as it unlocks the potential of large-scale pre-training for vision models without the need for human annotation. A common approach in recent work involves learning representations through pretext tasks, which automatically generate labels from the image data itself. Early methods focused on exploring the inherent structures within a single image, such as identifying spatial arrangement (Doersch et al., 2015), orientation (Gidaris et al., 2018), or chromatic channels (Zhang et al., 2016). These models successfully learned useful representations for downstream tasks.

Recently, another line of work has emerged, which includes studies by Wu et al. (2018), Bachman et al. (2019), Hjelm et al. (2018), Tian et al. (2019), He et al. (2020), Misra & van der Maaten (2020), and Chen et al. (2020a). These fall within the framework of contrastive learning (Hadsell et al., 2006), with methods such as Momentum Contrast (MoCo) focusing on directly learning relations between images as the pretext task. In practice, contrastive learning methods demonstrate superior generalization in downstream tasks.

Despite their varied designs, most contrastive learning methods perform an instance discrimination task, contrasting between different image instances. In this setup, given a query crop from one image, a positive sample is an image crop from the same image, while negative samples are randomly chosen from other images in the training set. The instance discrimination task uses a one-hot encoding for labels, bringing together crops from the same image while keeping apart those from different images in the feature space.

However, this approach has its limitations. The one-hot label used in instance discrimination might be problematic, as it treats all crops from other images as equally negative. This fails to reflect the heterogeneous similarities between the query crop and each negative sample. Some "negative" samples might be semantically similar to the query or even belong to the same semantic class. This issue, known as "class collision" (Saunshi et al., 2019) or "sampling bias" (Chuang et al., 2020), can hinder contrastive methods from learning an effective representation. Supervised contrastive learning (Khosla et al., 2020) addresses this issue using human-annotated class labels, achieving strong classification performance. However, these labels are unavailable in unsupervised learning, making it more challenging to capture crop similarities.

In this paper, we propose an alternative approach by viewing the instance discrimination task from the perspective of semi-supervised learning. The positive crop should be similar to the query as they originate from the same image and can thus be considered labeled. In contrast, the similarity between the query and crops from other images is unknown, or unlabeled. From this semi-supervised learning viewpoint, we introduce Consistent Contrast (CO2), a consistency regularization method that fits into the current contrastive learning framework. Consistency regularization (Sajjadi et al., 2016) is integral to many state-of-the-art semi-supervised learning algorithms (Xie et al., 2019; Berthelot et al., 2019b; Sohn et al., 2020). It generates pseudo labels for unlabeled data by assuming that a good model should output similar predictions on perturbed versions of the same image. In unsupervised contrastive learning, since the query crop and the positive crop naturally form two perturbed versions of the same image, we encourage them to have consistent similarities with each crop from other images.

The computer constructs a 3-D computer model of the face, with all 44 major muscles in the model moving like human muscles. Muscle clues are sometimes used to spot when a "smiling" politician or celebrity isn't being truthful. According to the Facial Feedback Theory of Emotion, moving facial muscles not only expresses emotions but may also produce them.

The claim for the value of using this technology to read students' emotional expressions is remarkable and could potentially reduce the risk of suicide and bullying among students. This technology could help keep people's minds focused and possibly make them more open-minded. For instance, if the computer detects sadness, it might suggest a game or video that could alter the person's mood.

En la mañana de hoy martes, los trabajadores realizaron un paro en el departamento de Maldonado (unidad operativa y regional), en las oficinas de Piriápolis y de San Carlos, tras la convocatoria de la Asociación de Funcionarios de la Dirección General Impositiva (AFI).

Además, el sindicato informó en un comunicado divulgado ayer lunes que la medida también se extenderá a las "giras inspectivas" que se están llevando adelante por los balnearios del país.

El sindicato se concentró sobre el mediodía frente al hotel Enjoy de Punta del Este. Los funcionarios tomaron estas medidas porque entienden que la DGI introdujo un cambio que recortará los salarios de los funcionarios del fisco.

Por otra parte, la DGI informó esta tarde que quedó suspendida la gira de verano por no poder desarrollar las actividades planificadas y para no afectar la actividad turística del país.

La DGI explicó en su página web que en la institución no se han realizado recortes ni incrementos salariales para nadie. El salario está compuesto por un sueldo fijo mensual y una prima por productividad que se cobra todos los años en marzo. Sin embargo, este pago está ligado al cumplimiento de metas grupales y no siempre se cobra en su totalidad.

El conflicto con el sindicato surgió a raíz de una propuesta del MEF y la DGI de asociar una parte de ese pago por rendimiento a objetivos institucionales como la recaudación, reducción de la evasión, eficiencia y mejora de la calidad en la atención.

Desde la DGI se considera que las medidas tomadas por el sindicato son desproporcionadas y se ocuparon locales de la DGI y el MEF, alterando el tránsito en Punta del Este.

Además, la DGI recibió una comunicación de la Asociación de Hoteles y Restaurantes del Uruguay expresando su preocupación por este tipo de medidas sindicales en momentos en que la actividad enfrenta dificultades regionales, climáticas y sociales en el Uruguay turístico que requiere el esfuerzo de todos los sectores.

MKBHD revient cette année avec un autre test de caméra pour smartphone à l’aveugle, mettant à l’épreuve les derniers smartphones de toutes les grandes marques. Les concurrents de cette année incluent l’iPhone 13 Pro, le Pixel 6 Pro, etc. Les iPhones ont toujours eu des capacités vidéo impressionnantes, mais le test de caméra à l’aveugle de Marques Brownlee a mis les capacités photo du téléphone à l’épreuve.

Les téléphones ont été soumis à une compétition basée sur des supports, les identifiant uniquement par une lettre, plutôt que par un nom, afin d’éviter les biais. Le concours a recueilli des millions de votes pour déterminer quel téléphone prend les meilleures photos. Au premier tour, l’iPhone 13 Pro a affronté le Motorola Edge et a remporté sa toute première victoire dans l’histoire du test d’appareil photo pour smartphone de MKBHD.

Au deuxième tour seulement, l’iPhone 13 Pro à 1 000 $ a été battu par le Pixel 5a à 399 $ de Google. En regardant les photos, on comprend pourquoi. Dans la photo d’Edge, la fenêtre derrière Brownlee est d’un blanc entièrement soufflé. L’iPhone, quant à lui, a conservé les détails et les couleurs du ciel et des nuages.

Au tour suivant, l’iPhone 13 Pro a affronté le Pixel 5a, qui a de manière assez surprenante battu le Pixel 6 Pro au tour précédent. Dans ce tour, le téléphone haut de gamme d’Apple a été battu par le téléphone économique de Google. Ce n’est pas trop surprenant, car une grande partie de ce qui fait la qualité d’un appareil photo pour smartphone est intégrée au logiciel plutôt qu'au matériel du téléphone – c’est ce qu’on appelle la photographie informatique.

Le Pixel 5a a remporté la compétition, battant le OnePlus 9 Pro au dernier tour. Alors que le téléphone économique de Google a peut-être remporté le test de la photo à l’aveugle, l’iPhone continue d’impressionner par ses capacités vidéo. Assurez-vous de regarder la vidéo complète de MKBHD pour le récapitulatif de tous les autres téléphones, y compris tout, du Galaxy S21 Ultra au Surface Duo 2.

المصدر: وكالات

أعلنت وزيرة الصحة الإسبانية كارولينا دارياس اليوم أن الحكومة صادقت على "العودة الطبيعية" للحضور الجماهيري إلى ملاعب الدوري الإسباني لكرة القدم وكرة السلة. وقالت دارياس عقب اجتماع لمجلس الوزراء: "سنلغي المادة 15-2 من قانون الوضع الطبيعي الجديد، وهذه المادة كانت تتعلق بحضور الجمهور في ملاعب كرة القدم الاحترافية وبطولة كرة السلة للمحترفين". وأضافت: "سنعود بالتالي إلى طبيعتنا في ما يتعلق بتدفق الجمهور"، مما يعني أنه سيكون هناك جمهور خلال استئناف موسم كرة القدم وكرة السلة في أغسطس المقبل، في وقت انتهى موسم 2020-2021 خلف أبواب مغلقة في معظم الملاعب.

وأكدت دارياس أن عودة الجمهور إلى الملاعب ستكون "كما كانت من قبل تنظمها المناطق المستقلة المختصة والتي سيتعين عليها تحديد الحضور لكل مباراة". هذا يعني أن بعض الملاعب، خاصة في شمال إسبانيا حيث لا يزال الوباء موجودًا، لا يزال بإمكانها تطبيق قيود معينة عند استئناف الموسم.

Colors blurred past the three of us as we trampled through the plains. I tried to keep myself from looking back; I had to accept that if I couldn't see him, he was probably long gone. Poor Jimmy, it was his idea in the first place. The creature used to be so docile until we learned why it had been kept in near starvation for so long. I can still hear the beast's neck stretching, the scarring sound of its bloodied teeth coming forth, and white fur recoiling into stakes of malice. Oh god, I can hear him screaming. He was too young....

No time to think. I can mourn if I live. I see a forest coming up; maybe we can hide this out. Who knows how long this rampage will last, though. The silent grass begins to transition into the rattle of leaves, and the blur of the environment turns into shades of brown and olive. The padded trampling of the beast never seems to have caught up, though. We begin to slow our pace, conserving our energy for—no, I don't want to think about that again. For now, we're alive. Our wordless, solemn sneak through the forest continued for at least an hour before words returned to us. 

"It's... getting late. We need to find shelter," said Alice, still stunned and shaking. 

She's right. Until now, I have been walking like a machine, focusing on my own existence, and not even noting the surroundings. For all I know, we could have walked through a small city, and I wouldn't have noticed. It just feels like the wrong time to be doing anything, given what still occupies our minds. Thankfully, Peter quickly noted a small cabin. It's probably some abandoned hunter's shack, judging by the diminutive size. Upon closer inspection, it seems to have been abandoned for several decades, likely more. It still has four walls and a roof, at least. Upon creaking open the dusty door, it seems as though many of the supplies have been left, too.

Autonomous vehicles operate in a highly dynamic environment, necessitating the successful and safe navigation through numerous challenges such as detection, tracking, prediction, and planning, among others. Recent contributions from the open-source community have significantly advanced the field of autonomous vehicle technology, particularly through the provision of open-source datasets like Argoverse2, the Waymo Open Dataset, and NuPlan. These datasets offer meticulously labeled sensor data, high-definition mapping, and various other critical information required for the safe and reliable navigation of autonomous vehicles.

High-definition maps, a vital component of these datasets, are essential to the operation of autonomy stacks, as shown by various methods that facilitate global planning for point-to-point navigation. These maps provide detailed, lane-level definitions and road network connectivity, offering the necessary context for prediction models, and aiding planning models in trajectory generation and optimization tasks.

However, it's important to recognize that these applications often assume a static world, which, in practice, can be disrupted by changes in road layouts or temporary constructions, potentially leading to failures.

Change detection in the field of remote sensing involves identifying differences in the state of an object or phenomenon by observing it at different times. This task typically employs methods and algorithms to compare two or more satellite images of the same scene, yielding results that can either map changes pixel by pixel or provide a score indicating the presence of more or less relevant changes within the area. Specifically, applying change detection to urban areas is particularly interesting as it monitors differences in land cover due to urban expansion over the years in a more automated way.

A wide variety of methods for change detection exist and have been classified and discussed, with the deep learning approach currently being an area of active research. In this context, using convolutional neural networks (CNNs) for change detection aims to provide a fast and useful analysis of an area. This analysis can be integrated into traditional post-processing workflows at ground stations, which combine results from several algorithms to produce a comprehensive map of all changes present in the scene.

However, training models with high generalization capabilities poses significant challenges due to varying urban patterns from country to country. Additionally, factors such as vegetation and seasonal changes often introduce contamination that is difficult to eliminate, which can reduce the performance of efficient CNNs.

There are two main approaches to achieve change detection using CNNs: semantic segmentation and classification. Semantic segmentation is more suitable for thorough analysis on the ground. In this approach, acquired data is downloaded at ground facilities, and the deep learning algorithm provides a detailed map of all detected changes within the area. Classification, on the other hand, is more onboard-oriented, as it evaluates the change content of a scene and transmits this estimation to ground stations. Ground stations can then decide whether to download the newly acquired data for further analysis. By exploiting onboard processing, specific monitoring tasks can be planned to filter only the most interesting data, thereby mitigating download bottlenecks.

At the same time, the usage of spectral bands from sensors like those on the Sentinel-2 twin satellites can aid in distinguishing relevant changes from less significant ones in urban and other areas.

Dear Sir,

Effective as of today, May 29th, 2014, I am resigning from your esteemed company. While I have spent several years under your leadership and have fond memories of my time here, I feel it is time for me to move on. The experiences gained during my tenure are invaluable, and I will always cherish them, yet I believe it is in my best interest to seek new opportunities.

I must express my disappointment with the compensation I have received during my employment. The salary provided has not been commensurate with my qualifications and the level of work I have contributed to the company. I have found it challenging to make ends meet, and the financial strain has been a significant factor in my decision to resign.

（中央社记者唐佩君、戴雅真日内瓦20日电）世界卫生大会（WHA）今日开幕，「邀请台湾以观察员身份参加WHA」成为会议讨论的焦点。友邦代表指出，将台湾排除在WHA之外将导致全球防疫体系出现重大缺口，若台湾发生疫情，势必危及全球。

上午，WHA会议在闭门进行的总务委员会上，友邦提出「台湾议题」，向世界卫生组织（WHO）提案将「邀请台湾以观察员身份参加WHA」列入议程。史瓦帝尼和宏都拉斯为台湾发声，而中国和古巴则表示反对，最终总务委员会建议不将该提案纳入议程。下午的大会议程中，友邦再次提出此请求，并展开「2对2辩论」。

中国国家卫生健康委员会主任马晓伟率先发言，重申「一中原则」，强调台湾参与WHA需通过两岸协商解决。他指责民进党执政后顽固坚持台独立场，拒不承认两岸同属一个中国，导致参与世卫大会的政治基础不复存在。

为台湾发言的是友邦马绍尔群岛和圣文森，反对方为中国和巴基斯坦。每方各有3分钟发言时间，最终大会仍遵循总务委员会建议，不列入议程。

马绍尔群岛卫生部长卡内克（Kalani Kaneko）指出，各国多有宪法保障国民权利，WHO也不例外。1948年4月7日生效的WHO组织法旨在打破藩篱，将人民置于优先，而非政治考量。作为一个中立机构，WHO应确保每个人都有权享有健康，不因种族、宗教、政治信仰、经济或社会情况而有差异。

他强调，WHO无视台湾2300万人民的基本权益，不允许台湾参与全球卫生体系，违背了其组织法。

Le texte parle d'un projet de rénovation de grande envergure concernant l'une des principales artères de la ville, avec des travaux prévus entre le pont Cummings et le boulevard Saint-Laurent. 

Les travaux sur le chemin de Montréal incluront la réfection de la conduite d’eau principale existante, des réparations ponctuelles aux égouts, la reconstruction de la chaussée et des trottoirs, ainsi que l’aménagement de voies cyclables surélevées. 

Par ailleurs, le chemin North River, entre le chemin de Montréal et son impasse au nord, bénéficiera également d'une remise à neuf. La majeure partie des travaux devrait commencer en 2019.

Mathieu Fleury assure qu’il y aura au moins une voie disponible dans chaque direction. Dans certaines sections du chemin de Montréal, il pourrait même y en avoir deux. Photo : Radio-Canada

Le conseiller municipal du quartier Rideau-Vanier, Mathieu Fleury, a une autre vision pour l'aménagement. « La Ville proposait une voie cyclable sur la rue. Nous, nous proposons d'élargir le trottoir, car nous n’aimons pas l'interaction entre les véhicules et les vélos. Nous croyons vraiment qu'il est plus judicieux de séparer ces usages », explique-t-il.

Le conseiller reconnaît que la période des travaux sera extrêmement difficile, mais il souligne que les commerces resteront ouverts et qu’il n’est pas prévu de soutien financier de la Ville pour compenser les pertes éventuelles des commerçants.

La Ville d’Ottawa organise, ce mardi soir, une séance d'information sur le projet de revitalisation du chemin de Montréal. Deux autres séances seront planifiées au cours des prochains mois.

*Bzzzt*

Rick Banuelos was not one to send or receive text messages, so he found it strange to hear his phone buzzing at six in the morning while he was driving to work. As the first person at the office each day, he couldn't fathom who would be awake at this hour. Initially, it didn't bother him much, until...

*Bzzt*
*Bzzt*
*Bzzt*

The rhythmic vibrations on his phone made him certain it wasn't a call. He suspected he was receiving a series of texts in quick succession. The stress from work had been seeping into his dreams lately, leaving him unsettled. Just the previous night, he dreamt of his office morphing into a prison, waking up drenched in sweat. Determined not to let lack of sleep affect him, he refocused as his exit approached in a mile. Checking his rearview mirror, he prepared to merge into the right lane when his phone began buzzing frantically.

*bzzt*
*bzzt*
*bzzt*
*bzzt*
*bzzt*
*bzzt*
*bzzt*

"Frustrated, Rick twisted around his seatbelt, struggling to retrieve his phone from the pocket. Eleven missed picture messages from an unknown number with only six digits - 373267. 373267. Keeping one eye on the road, Rick opened the new conversation on his phone.

The images appeared to be a collection of his workplace - the familiar palm tree, the water cooler, and then he saw it - the door to the prison. Rick's curiosity peaked, but his attention was pulled back to the road. He spotted his exit on the right, but failed to notice the car in his blind spot. The screech of metal meeting metal was the last sound he registered.

His loved ones gathered by Rick's hospital bed. The remnants of the crash were scattered on the nightstand. "We don't know when or if he'll wake up. I'm sorry," the doctor's words lingered heavily in the room.

One by one, the mourners left, leaving only Rick's mother behind.

Small-molecule drug discovery follows an iterative process where existing knowledge guides the design of new molecules for synthesis and testing. This approach results in a series of molecules with progressively improved properties. The drug discovery process is costly and time-consuming, with the duration mainly determined by the number of design, synthesis, and testing cycles required to enhance the properties of successive generations of small molecules to meet project criteria. Typically, decisions on modifying small molecules in each iteration rely on human intuition. However, there is a growing interest in developing machine learning models that can analyze existing data to suggest molecule modifications likely to enhance specific properties of interest, such as interaction strength with drug targets or related properties like hydrophobicity and stability.

If machine learning models can assist scientists in making better design decisions, they have the potential to significantly boost the efficiency and success rate of drug discovery programs. Various representations of small molecules exist, each with specific advantages and disadvantages for molecular design purposes. The most common representation is a "molecular graph," detailing atom connectivity and stereochemistry. Another representation is SMILES, a concise text-based format mapping chemical species to unique ASCII strings, successfully utilized in deep learning models for molecule generation.

While SMILES provides an exact structural representation, it can struggle with distinguishing small chemical differences, hampering its effectiveness in tailoring molecular properties. Extended connectivity fingerprints, on the other hand, capture the local chemical environment around heavy atoms and are more effective in representing chemical similarity. However, fingerprints do not always correspond directly to single molecules, making it challenging to utilize them for molecular property enhancement.

To bridge this gap, we propose DESMILES, a deep learning model that translates fingerprints into SMILES strings and suggests modified molecules with improved properties. By training DESMILES on synthetically feasible molecules and employing transfer learning, we enhance its ability to propose chemically related molecules with desirable properties for drug discovery. DESMILES has shown promising results in various drug discovery tasks, outperforming existing methods in modifying molecules for specific targets and enhancing their interactions. Its success lies in its ability to reorganize chemical space effectively through transfer learning, guiding molecule modifications towards desired properties for downstream drug discovery tasks.

Carla was the one who found him, stuffed haphazardly behind some hay bales near the camel paddock. Bobo the clown was found dead. His mangled body was still clothed in the colorful fabrics from our performance the night before. The poor girl didn't know what to do and ran straight to me. I was the ringleader in more than just job description, I kept our little band of oddballs together behind the scenes too. And now one of us was dead. As soon as I was sure Carla would be alright for a few minutes alone, I phoned the local police and made my way to the paddocks. It was a grisly scene. I didn't want to look too closely at the body of my dead friend, but something in his hand flashed in the morning sunlight. I was alone, and the other performers were probably still waking up.
