L’attaque qui a frappé la capitale du Burkina Faso dans la nuit de dimanche à lundi n’a pas encore été revendiquée. Cependant, son mode opératoire rappelle fortement celui de l’assaut perpétré par des terroristes contre le café Capuccino en janvier 2016. Retour sur les attentats jihadistes ciblant des étrangers dans la région du Sahel.

### Une nuit de cauchemar déjà vécue à Ouagadougou  
Une nuit comme celle-ci, Ouagadougou en a déjà connue une, en janvier 2016. Des terroristes avaient alors pris d’assaut le café Capuccino, suivi d’un autre bar et, enfin, d’un hôtel. Cette série d’attaques avait coûté la vie à trente personnes et avait été revendiquée quelques jours plus tard par al-Qaïda au Maghreb islamique (Aqmi).  

En mars de la même année, les enquêteurs burkinabè ont annoncé avoir identifié le commanditaire de l’attaque. Il s’agirait d’Ould Nouiny, alias El Hassan, émir du groupe al-Mourabitoune, une organisation affiliée à l’Algérien Mokhtar Belmokhtar, allié d’Aqmi.

### Aqmi, al-Mourabitoune et les anciens membres d’Ansar Dine  
Selon les investigations, deux des présumés organisateurs de ces attentats de janvier, actuellement détenus, seraient également impliqués dans l’attaque menée contre la station balnéaire ivoirienne de Grand-Bassam, le 13 mars 2016. Ce jour-là, 19 personnes avaient perdu la vie.  

Le Mali, pays voisin, a lui aussi été le théâtre de plusieurs attentats, dont le scénario pourrait rappeler celui de l’attaque de cette nuit contre le café Aziz-Istanbul de Ouagadougou. Le plus récent remonte au dimanche 18 juin dernier et a visé le campement de Kangaba, en périphérie de Bamako. Ce drame avait fait cinq victimes.  

### Des cibles privilégiées : les étrangers  
Les témoignages recueillis ont révélé que les assaillants cherchaient prioritairement à viser « des blancs ». Cette attaque avait ensuite été revendiquée par le Groupe de soutien à l'islam et aux musulmans, une alliance terroriste dirigée par Iyad Ag Ghali, ancien leader d’Ansar Dine.

新冠肺炎疫情持续数月，就业市场也不乐观。政府今日（19日）公布了最新的失业率数据，2月至4月的最新失业率升至5.2%，创下2009年以来的新高。此外，失业人数增加了4万人，达到了20.25万人，重返了2009年的水平。学者认为这些数字反映了失业情况相当严重，但他们认为政府的"保就业计划"可以在短期内帮助社会度过难关，但长远来看，需要政府放宽限聚令和解除出入境限制，才能希望就业情况得到改善。

香港中文大学经济学系副教授、刘佐德全球经济及金融研究所常务所长庄太量指出，今日公布的失业率数据是2至4月的平均数，与首季的失业率4.2%相比，他认为增加的速度"快了一些"。不过，他认为最近疫情趋缓，再加上政府放宽了限聚令，市民外出消费增加，预计失业情况不会恶化，"数字已经见顶，5月会有改善。希望开放，有机会降到3%左右。"

政府早前推出了"保就业计划"，庄太量表示，这些措施的目的是希望企业能够保持3月底的就业人数，对于就业情况"可以起到一些帮助，帮助社会度过难关，但经济复苏终究不是靠政府养，而是靠市场。"

LUMBERTON — A meeting of the Board of Education of the Public Schools of Robeson County unfolded on Tuesday, where Schools Superintendent Shanita Wooten’s proposal for additional legal assistance was declined. The board engaged in an intense discussion before a nearly full audience regarding Wooten's plan to hire the Raleigh-based law firm Tharrington Smith to aid in matters concerning personnel, exceptional children, and building contracts.

The conversation was heavily influenced by the pressing issue of a $2 million operating deficit, declining enrollment, pending layoffs, and insufficient local funding. During the meeting, board member Loistine DeFreece expressed her concerns, pointing out that additional staff had already been hired to address exceptional children’s programs and stressing the financial constraints, stating, "Since we are broke, the people in place can do the work."

Board member Linda Emanuel shared her skepticism about hiring more legal consultants amid financial challenges. On the other hand, board member Brian Freeman criticized board attorney Grady Hunt, arguing for the need for more specialized knowledge in public school law. "We need to replace what we have," Freeman asserted, prompting Craig Lowry to defend Hunt’s longstanding service to the schools.

John Campbell, another board member, sought clarity on the financial implications of additional legal assistance. He emphasized the importance of informed decision-making, yet his request for details went unanswered. Despite differing opinions, Freeman highlighted the superintendent's need for help, suggesting, “Dr. Wooten needs help, she’s waving a red flag.”

Board member Brenda Fairley-Ferebee took offense to implications of insufficient support for the superintendent and reiterated the board’s commitment by hiring additional staff. Campbell, however, emphasized the need to support the superintendent's request, urging the board to take a "leap of faith."

Finance Director Erica Setzer was called upon to clarify the school district's financial situation. She noted that schools would need to reduce staff by next year, but reassured that payroll was secure for now. Setzer revealed the extent of the district's financial strain, detailing the impact of a $2 million deficit exacerbated by declining enrollment since the 2015-16 school year.

Setzer explained that dwindling enrollment resulted in more instructional support personnel than state funding covers. Local funding from the Robeson County Board of Commissioners remains minimal, with public schools receiving only 17 percent of the county's budget, according to Setzer. She further elaborated on the school's financial dilemma, mentioning the risk of losing low wealth funding—a crucial supplement for North Carolina's poorest counties.

The discussion led to a suggestion from board member Randy Lawson to hold a retreat to address the deficit, including potential staff reductions. As the school district seeks $18 million more in funding, the board voted to provide preliminary budget information to the county while requesting a 30-day extension for finalizing funding requests.

In the public comment section, attention was drawn to the plight of W.H. Knuckles Elementary School, which suffered damage from hurricanes and experienced enrollment decline. Local residents, including Carletta Thompson and Lumberton City Councilman John Cantey Jr., advocated for the school's repair and equitable treatment.

During the meeting, the board made additional decisions: appointing Terry Smith to the Robeson Community College Board of Trustees and agreeing to sell land to The University of North Carolina at Pembroke for $75,000. Rent-free use of the university’s facilities had previously benefited the district in the wake of Hurricane Matthew.

The board also renewed a contract with Southeastern Health for athletic trainers and approved $2.1 million in Indian Education Act funding, highlighting ongoing support for critical educational and safety programs despite financial challenges.

In hospital rooms across America, women are tragically dying after childbirth, highlighting a pressing issue that the Mothers Matter series aims to tackle to prevent further tragedies.

While giving birth can be an exhilarating, beautiful, and daunting experience for a woman, in Georgia, it can also pose serious risks. In 2010, Georgia was identified by Amnesty International as the state with the highest maternal mortality rate in the nation, with a significant number of those affected being African-American women.

According to the state Department of Public Health, between 1999 and 2016, there were 755 maternal deaths in Georgia, with 253 white mothers and 413 black mothers among the victims. These statistics do not account for the mothers who narrowly escaped death.

Tiffany Crockett, who gave birth to her daughter Callie three years ago, experienced a near-death scare shortly after childbirth. Tiffany began experiencing severe symptoms like headaches, chest pain, and blurred vision. Initially misdiagnosed with a sinus infection, she later discovered she had postpartum pre-eclampsia, a rare condition where blood pressure spikes after childbirth, putting her at risk of a stroke.

Fortunately, Tiffany survived, crediting her decision to heed her body's warning signs for her survival. Not everyone is as lucky, and the challenges faced by new mothers, especially in Georgia, are concerning.

Dr. Champa Woodham, an expert in maternal and fetal medicine, sheds light on the various complications that can arise post-birth, including cardiovascular issues and hemorrhaging. Access to adequate healthcare is also a significant concern, particularly in underserved rural areas where labor and delivery units are closing down, leaving pregnant women with limited options and often having to travel long distances for medical attention.

Driverless cars are not just a concept from science fiction; they are indeed a thing of the future. These vehicles offer numerous benefits, including improved fuel efficiency, enhanced utility, and increased safety, making them a promising innovation in the automotive industry.

One of the most significant advantages of driverless cars is their potential for better fuel efficiency. These vehicles operate using sophisticated computer systems that can determine the most efficient routes, leading to considerable fuel savings. As the author notes, "The cars he foresees would use half the fuel of today's taxis." As technology advances, we are getting closer to developing a fully fuel-efficient, driverless car.

Moreover, driverless cars are already being integrated into the market, equipped with features that assist the driver, especially in challenging conditions. For instance, the passage highlights, "In 2013, BMW announced the development of 'Traffic Jam Assistant.' The car can handle driving functions at speeds up to 25 mph, but special touch sensors make sure the driver keeps hold of the wheel." This development demonstrates the progress we are making toward the reality of fully autonomous vehicles.

For driverless cars to become completely autonomous, they will require a vast array of sensors, but the goal of making them accident-free is within reach.

Ils représentent les emblèmes distinctifs de Versace. Tout d'abord, le motif Greca, inspiré des fresques ornementales de l'architecture de la Grèce antique. Ensuite, la figure de la Méduse, symbole de beauté et de passion fatale dans la mythologie grecque, qui orne même le portail du manoir Versace à Miami. C'est sur ces deux emblèmes que Donatella Versace s'est concentrée cette saison.

© Carlo Scarpato pour Versace

Le Greca réinventé

Elle a retravaillé le motif Greca en jouant sur l'échelle et le graphisme, le déclinant en trois dimensions. Généralement placé en bordure des vêtements, il apparaît cette saison en imprimé intégral, ornant des paires de gants, des tailleurs et des sacs à main, où il crée l'effet d'un monogramme géométrique. Par ailleurs, il est utilisé de manière plus prononcée, sur des mailles pour hommes, des écharpes ou des manteaux. Décliné dans des tons bruns chaleureux ou des couleurs pop, il apporte du relief à une collection majoritairement noire, mettant l'accent sur des volumes courts et cintrés.

© Versace

La méduse graffiti

Revisitée sur le dos d'une veste pour homme, des foulards ou des chemises, la Méduse prend un nouveau visage. Cette célèbre tête de femme aux cheveux de serpents, symbole de l'érotisme propre à Versace, adopte un aspect comique et se transforme en smiley, comme s'il était griffonné à la bombe en un rien de temps. Un clin d'œil humoristique à la culture clubbing, s'ajoutant aux nombreux messages d'amour et de célébration qui caractérisent les collections de cette saison. S'il y a une marque qui maîtrise ce mélange de glamour, de sensualité et de provocation associé à la fête, c'est bien Versace.

A klaxon shrills throughout the cold metal of my enclosure. I awake, startled, and try to make my conscious brain aware of my surroundings. Where am I? I look around and take in my location. I was sitting on a metal cot, my feet on the floor and my back against the wall, fast asleep.

There are shoes on my feet—thick, massive boots. I am wearing a white shirt and orange pants. The floor is a metallic grate that screeches and squawks under my thick boots. The wall in front of me and to my left is a flat white. I reach out to touch it. It is cold. Behind me, the wall bears a similar story. White matte covering cold steel. My only mental salvation lies to my right. The wall mimics the others, but with one crucial difference: a tall door rises up from the center of the floor. There is no window, nor do I see a way to open it.

A second klaxon blares through my habitat, jerking me from my thoughts. What is happening? I stand up and attempt to step toward the door. The boots are heavy. So heavy. My foot lands, and I try to pick up my other one. It stays on the ground, immobile. I lose my balance and begin to fall. In an effort to correct myself, I try to slide my other foot underneath me. It too is now locked to the floor, and I lose my footing. I land hard on my left shoulder, filling it with a sharp pain. It feels familiar, as if it's happened before a thousand times.

Suddenly, I hear a voice erupt seemingly from nowhere, filling my tiny cabin with a sense of control. "Prisoner 127! Move back to your cot—now." Who is this? Who is prisoner 127? Is it me? This feels familiar, but wrong... in an inexplicable way. The order is repeated, this time the tone more strict and severe. "I... can't!" I reply, helplessly. My feet can't move. "I will not tell you again," the voice demands.

I try to regain my stature. To my surprise, the boots now move as I slide my feet under me. I pick myself up and sit back on my cot, as the voice requests. With a sharp, metallic sound, my boots once again adhere themselves to the floor. I am stuck. The door opens to my right. I manage to inhale a quick breath of air before three men in dark, unmarked, protective gear and helmets enter the room and grab ahold of me. I want to shout, "What the hell are you doing!?" But the wind is knocked from my lungs by one of the assailant's helmets crushing into my chest, pushing my chin toward the ceiling. With my head locked into place by a helmet and my feet magnetically sealed to the ground, the remaining men grab an arm each. The man in front of me grabs my head and pushes it between my legs, locking it into place under the weight of his body. From there, my arms are twisted behind my back and locked together. I hear the sound of zip-ties clicking together and feel their tightness on my wrists. The sound is familiar.

The two men on my flanks lift me up while the third exits the room. With a quick hand gesture, I feel the floor release my shoes from its metallic grip. He comes back into the room and places a bag over my head. I am escorted from the room.

The boots are heavy. I count my steps, though I don't know why. Clomp. "1," Clomp. "2," Clomp. "3." I count to 47 before I hear a door open in front of me.

IBM experienced a noteworthy milestone as its quarterly revenue increased for the first time in almost six years, primarily fueled by growth in key areas such as cloud and security services. Specifically, in the fourth quarter ending on Dec. 31, the company's revenue surged by 3.6 percent to reach US$22.54 billion, marking a significant uptick after 23 consecutive quarters of stagnation.

Despite this revenue growth, IBM reported a net loss of $1.05 billion, translating to a loss of $1.14 per share, compared to a profit of $4.50 billion or $4.72 per share. This decline in profitability can be attributed to a $5.5 billion charge linked to the recent U.S. tax reform.

(Reporting by Pushkala Aripaka in Bengaluru; Editing by Maju Samuel)

نلقي الضوء في هذا المقال على أحدث تفاصيل مباراة برشلونة وأتلتيك بلباو، التي ستجرى اليوم الأحد 17 يناير، ضمن نهائي كأس السوبر الإسباني. يتصارع الفريقان في هذه المباراة المرتقبة، حيث تمكن برشلونة من التأهل للنهائي بعد فوزه على ريال سوسيداد بركلات الجزاء، بعد انتهاء الوقت الأصلي بتعادل الفريقين بهدف لكل منهما.

سيتم إقامة المباراة بين برشلونة وأتلتيك بلباو في تمام الساعة العاشرة مساءً بتوقيت القاهرة، والساعة الحادية عشر مساءً بتوقيت مكة المكرمة، والساعة الثانية عشر مساءً بتوقيت دولة الإمارات العربية المتحدة. بينما تأهل أتلتيك بلباو إلى المباراة النهائية بعد تغلبه على ريال مدريد بهدفين مقابل هدف.

ومن المقرر أن يقوم المعلق السعودي فهد العتيبي بنقل أحداث هذه المباراة المهمة بين برشلونة وأتلتيك بلباو عبر شاشات قنوات الرياضية السعودية.

Have you ever wanted to be a seagoing cowboy? Well, you should consider it because you get to travel the world and work with animals. I think that being a seagoing cowboy offers a unique opportunity to explore different parts of the globe with your friends while also caring for animals and witnessing new sights along the way.

Furthermore, as a seagoing cowboy, you have the chance to assist people in need by delivering animals to them. The text mentions Luke's experience of traveling the world with his best friend, highlighting the camaraderie and shared adventures that come with the job.

While some may have concerns about the challenges of being on a boat for an extended period, such as the potential risks of the boat sinking with a cargo of 335 horses, the text emphasizes the rewarding aspects of the journey, including the opportunity to bond with both fellow crew members and the animals being transported.

Additionally, the text mentions the importance of being cautious on the boat to avoid accidents like falling into the sea, underscoring the need for vigilance and safety measures while undertaking the seagoing cowboy role.

حل الفنان مصطفى البنا، الشهير بـ"سعفان"، ضيفًا اليوم في برنامج "5 نجوم". استُدرج سعفان إلى مكان التصوير بفضل إقناع الفنان محمد الشرنوبي، الذي أراد عمل مقلب به دون علمه. تم اصطحابه إلى مكان التصوير الذي كان عبارة عن مزرعة أبقار ومنتجات ألبان.

في المزرعة، انفعل الفنان سعفان عندما طلب منه المخرج الهندي للإعلان أن يقول جملة "سعفان بقرة"، مما دفعه للقول: "انتوا هتزلونا ولا أيه بتصوير الإعلان دا؟".

لاحقًا، طلب الفنان محمد الشرنوبي من سعفان أن يتم تعليقه في الهواء لتقديم إعلان الألبان، وهو في هذا الوضع. وبعد رفعه في الهواء، كشف له الشرنوبي عن حقيقة المقلب، وطلب منه أن يعتذر له حتى يقوم بإنزاله.

برنامج "خمس نجوم" يعرض على قناة "إم بي سي مصر" يوميًا طوال شهر رمضان، في تمام الساعة التاسعة مساءً. يُجمع البرنامج، لأول مرة، النجوم غادة عادل، ونور، وكريم فهمي، ومصطفى قمر، ومحمد الشرنوبي؛ حيث يقدمون حلقات كاميرا خفية بأسلوب غير تقليدي ضمن أماكن مختلفة، مما يفجر الكثير من المواقف المضحكة.

Des verrouillages ont été imposés et des restrictions sont de retour partout. Cependant, des histoires de personnes se défendant les unes les autres, quelle que soit leur religion, ont inondé les médias sociaux. Alors que nous nous aidons les uns les autres depuis les confins de nos maisons, voici quelques drames interconfessionnels de Bollywood à regarder à la maison.

**Pinjar**  
Le chef-d’œuvre du drame de la période indienne de 2003 met en vedette Urmila Matondkar et Manoj Bajpayee. Il était basé sur le roman punjabi d’Amrita Pritam du même nom. Le film dépeint des émeutes hindou-musulmanes. Rashid (Bajpayee) est un musulman qui kidnappe Puro (Matondkar), une hindoue, à cause d’un différend ancestral entre leurs familles. Bientôt, sa famille la renie. Finalement, les deux tombent amoureux.

**Jodhaa Akbar**  
Le film de 2008 d’Ashutosh Gowariker mettait en vedette Aishwarya Rai Bachchan et Hrithik Roshan. Il se situe au 16ème siècle et dépeint la romance entre l’empereur moghol Akbar et sa femme Jodhaa qui était hindoue. Jodhaa est réduite à un pion politique car son alliance est fixée avec l’empereur pour des raisons politiques. Mais leur respect mutuel grandit à mesure qu’ils apprennent à respecter les croyances de l’autre et finissent par tomber amoureux. Le film a été un succès critique et commercial.

**Veer Zara**  
Le chef-d’œuvre de Yash Chopra mettait en vedette Shah Rukh Khan et Preity Zinta dans les rôles principaux. Veer est un pilote indien qui sauve Zara, une musulmane pakistanaise, lors d’une opération de sauvetage.

La ciudad de Laredo invita a los turistas mexicanos a celebrar las ofertas del "Black Friday". En este próximo viernes 29 de noviembre, ofrecerán diversas opciones para ir de compras, como The Outlet Shoppes, Adidas, Nautica, Coach, entre otras tiendas.

Para aquellos a quienes les guste el deporte, podrán disfrutar del campo de golf The Max, ubicado a orillas del Río Grande. El club ofrece un servicio de transporte desde los hoteles para mayor comodidad de quienes deseen evitar el tráfico y el bullicio de la ciudad, o para aquellos que deseen liberar adrenalina después de ir de compras.

Además, Laredo cuenta con una amplia oferta hotelera, con 45 opciones de distintas categorías. Para conocerlas, se puede descargar la aplicación VISITLAREDOTX, disponible en IOS y Android.

Image style transfer aims to automatically transfer the artistic style from a source image to a given content one, which has been a long-studied topic in the computer vision community. Traditionally, image style transfer has been viewed as a problem of non-photorealistic rendering in computer graphics. Building on the success of deep learning [9, 41, 8, 55, 10], Gatys et al. [11] introduced a paradigm that utilizes feature activations from deep convolutional neural networks (CNNs) to extract and match the target content and style, resulting in the advantages of no explicit style restrictions and no need for ground-truth training data. This led to the development of various CNN-based style transfer methods in the literature [22, 25, 5, 49, 47, 15, 13], establishing a new field called neural style transfer (NST) [18].

State-of-the-art NST algorithms can be classified into two categories: parametric and non-parametric methods, depending on the style representation mechanisms. Parametric NST approaches use global summary statistics over the entire feature map from pre-trained deep CNNs to extract and match the artistic style [11, 21, 14], while non-parametric methods, also known as patch-based NST methods [6, 42], employ local feature patches for style representation, inspired by conventional patch-based texture modeling with Markov random fields. Despite their benefits, both parametric and non-parametric methods have limitations, as illustrated in Fig. 1.

In this work, we introduce a semi-parametric style transfer approach to address the limitations of existing methods. Our approach facilitates more accurate correspondences between different content and style regions, addressing the issue of content-style mismatching in non-parametric NST algorithms and enhancing the stylization quality. By adaptively partitioning content and style features into small, cross-scale patches, our semi-parametric method resolves the challenge of lacking local details present in previous parametric schemes.

To facilitate this semi-parametric style transfer, we leverage graph neural networks (GNNs) as a learning mechanism to enable local, patch-level interactions between content and style. GNNs, well-suited for non-Euclidean data, explicitly capture structural relations and interdependencies between nodes, making them ideal for addressing the complex region matching problem in style transfer. By employing GNNs, we establish faithful topological correspondences between content and style regions, enabling optimal stylization of each content region with the appropriate style strokes.

Our proposed semi-parametric NST introduces a heterogeneous graph with content and style feature patches as vertices, facilitating parametric aggregation through message passing between patch nodes in the stylization graph. By leveraging GNN mechanisms such as graph attention networks, we aggregate the k most similar patches in a parametric manner. These aggregated patches are then integrated back into image features and aligned with target global statistics to achieve the final stylized output. Additionally, we introduce a deformable graph convolutional operation that enables cross-scale style-content matching with varying stroke sizes within a single stylized image. Our GNN-based NST also offers flexibility in performing patch-based stylization by adjusting the number of connections during inference.

In conclusion, our novel semi-parametric style transfer approach allows for the generation of both global and local style patterns effectively, supported by a dedicated deformable graph convolutional design. By modeling the NST process as message passing between content and style using GNNs, we achieve superior results compared to existing methods, as demonstrated in our experimental evaluations.

Ms. Frizzle twisted a strand of her orange hair, "a few weeks ago we studied the body if that's what you mean?"

Ms. Frizzle stood and started to leave. "These weren't trips, Mrs. Smith. It's called using the imagination and, as a certified teacher and scientist, I'm pretty good at it. Now, may I get back to work, I have lessons to plan?"

Mrs. Smith, the PTA president, yelled, "Ms. Frizzle! You took a field trip, without permission, inside my son's body! Does that sound familiar?" Her scarf collar was perfectly puffed and complimented her Easter pink blouse.

"No, ma'am," Mrs. Smith sunk her head into her hands, "I'm talking about the field trip where you shrank down and flew up my son's nose, endangering all of the children's lives and causing, God knows, what kind of psychological damage to them."

"Well, that seems like a great lesson plan. I'd never endanger students, though," Ms. Frizzle's iguana crawled up her shoulder.

El Atlético de Madrid continúa soñando con LaLiga gracias al gol tempranero de Griezmann en Málaga. El equipo se encuentra a seis puntos del Barcelona, con un partido menos disputado. Griezmann trabajó arduamente y se destacó como el mejor jugador del equipo dirigido por Simeone.

El Atlético de Madrid obtuvo los tres puntos en su visita a La Rosaleda al vencer al Málaga por 0-1, en uno de los partidos más interesantes de la jornada 23 de LaLiga Santander. Antoine Griezmann fue el autor del único gol del encuentro.

El partido comenzó de la mejor manera para el Atlético, con un disparo de Saúl que fue desviado por la defensa y aprovechado por Griezmann, quien con un tiro de derecha venció a Roberto. El Atlético marcó a los 40 segundos de juego.

A partir de ahí, el Atlético controló el partido, manteniendo la posesión y evitando que el Málaga llegara al área de Oblak. Aunque Diego Costa lo intentó, fue bien defendido.

El Málaga tuvo una oportunidad a través de Ideye. El centro de Chory desde la izquierda fue cabeceado por el nigeriano, pero el balón pasó cerca del palo de Oblak, quien apenas tuvo acción en la primera mitad.

En la segunda mitad, el Málaga tomó la iniciativa. Los dirigidos por José González salieron decididos a empatar, pero nunca pudieron romper la línea defensiva del Atlético.

La mejor oportunidad del partido fue para Rosales, cuyo tiro libre que se dirigía a la escuadra fue salvado por una gran estirada de Oblak.

El grupo parlamentario de Ciudadanos fortaleció ayer la oposición política contra la decisión del Principado de Asturias de concentrar la inversión en educación pública para proteger el servicio docente en medio de la pandemia. La portavoz del partido naranja en la Junta General, Laura Pérez Macho, instó al vicepresidente del Gobierno regional, Juan Cofiño, a reconsiderar su postura, argumentando que uno de cada tres estudiantes en Asturias asiste a centros concertados y que estos no son diferentes ni tienen menos derechos que los de la red pública. Pérez Macho afirmó que sería irresponsable desentenderse de su bienestar y el de sus familias, calificando de inaceptable la justificación del Principado al priorizar sus obligaciones con la educación pública.

La diputada desenmascara el "prejuicio ideológico contra la educación concertada" que percibe en el PSOE e IU. En cuanto a la posibilidad de recurrir a los tribunales, que el Partido Popular ha sugerido en su ofensiva contra el Gobierno, Pérez Macho se inclinó por buscar una solución al problema en lugar de judicializar la política, aunque también mencionó la posibilidad de considerar el enfoque legal.

Depuis 1996, l'Association pour le Développement des Entreprises de Toulon Ouest (ADETO) joue un rôle essentiel dans la structuration et le renforcement économique de son territoire. Elle réunit et représente la diversité des savoir-faire et expertises qui enrichissent le tissu économique local. 

Historiquement, l'ADETO couvre un périmètre économique vibrant, s'étendant entre Ollioules, Six-Fours et La Seyne-sur-Mer. Ce territoire accueille 1 700 entreprises générant 17 000 emplois sur 800 hectares. Michel Cresp, président de l'association, souligne sa diversité : « Nous ne sommes pas un pôle spécialisé, mais très hétérogène », avec des activités artisanales, industrielles et commerciales, ainsi que de nombreuses TPE/PME, sans oublier des fleurons comme Naval Group, CNIM et Ifremer.

L'ADETO a pour mission de structurer, soutenir et revendiquer les intérêts de ces entreprises, quelle que soit leur taille. « Nous sommes un catalyseur, un facilitateur, notre rôle est de fluidifier les relations entre entreprises et institutions pour créer de la valeur », explique Michel Cresp.

Ces dernières années, l'association a surtout mis l'accent sur la mise en lien des entreprises entre elles, afin de combler un manque de reconnaissance mutuelle des compétences existantes sur le territoire. Michel Cresp note que certaines entreprises cherchaient parfois des savoir-faire ailleurs, ignorant ceux disponibles à proximité.

Cette volonté de créer du lien a permis à l'ADETO de rassembler davantage d'entreprises, avec une augmentation significative du nombre d'adhérents, atteignant aujourd'hui 260 membres. Michel Cresp commente : « Les entreprises recherchent activement cette mise en relation, souvent par le bouche-à-oreille ». L'objectif est d'atteindre 400 adhérents, tout en se concentrant sur le modèle économique de l'association.

Pour être efficace, l'ADETO a besoin de ressources, tant humaines que financières.

شهدت الصين، أكبر سوق للسيارات في العالم، تراجعاً في مبيعات السيارات للمرة الأولى خلال أكثر من عقدين في عام 2018. وفي وقت سابق من هذا الشهر، أعلنت الحكومة عن تدابير لتعزيز مبيعات السيارات، تشمل منع الحكومات المحلية من فرض سقف على استهلاك واستخدام سيارات الطاقة الجديدة.

خلال الأشهر الخمسة الأولى من العام الجاري، صدرت الصين 392 ألف مركبة، بانخفاض 4.9% على أساس سنوي، وفقاً لبيانات صناعية نشرتها وكالة أنباء الصين الجديدة «شينخوا». وأظهرت بيانات الجمعية الصينية لمصنعي السيارات أنه في شهر مايو وحده، صدرت البلاد 78 ألف مركبة، بانخفاض 16.4% مقارنة مع ذات الشهر من العام الماضي.

Funcionarios adscritos a la DIP-Zulia de la Policía Nacional Bolivariana (PNB) lograron la detención de un jíbaro en el sector El Bajo, parroquia El Bajo del municipio San Francisco.
El ciudadano arrestado fue identificado como Johangel Urdaneta (31), a quien le incautaron cincuenta envoltorios tipo cebolla que presuntamente contenían marihuana, además de una motocicleta marca MD y un vehículo marca Chevrolet, modelo Malibú.
Según la minuta oficial, Urdaneta está siendo investigado por venta ilícita de sustancias estupefacientes y psicotrópicas, así como su posible relación con una organización delictiva dedicada al robo, hurto y cobro de extorsiones.
Tanto el detenido como el caso fueron puestos a disposición del Ministerio Público.

The Great War ended over a decade ago, yet for us, it might as well have ended yesterday. Buildings remain in ruins, craters mar the roads, and the sky is a perpetually somber gray. Abandoned vehicles, left to the elements years ago, have been reduced to bare metal, serving now only as instruments for the cursing wind. 

Millions perished during the war, and millions more have died since, succumbing to disease, famine, and despair. These are the daily challenges faced by those of us unfortunate enough to have survived. 

People will wonder for years why we acted as we did.

Lenders' attempt to auction Kingfisher House in Mumbai—the headquarters of Kingfisher Airlines—failed for the fifth time despite a further cut in the reserve price. The 17,000 square-foot property is located in Ville Parle, near the domestic airport.

Initially, the property was put on the market in March 2016 with a reserve price of ₹150 crore. However, after failing to attract any buyers, banks decided to lower the price. In the last 15 months, the reserve price was reduced by 37.66%, yet it still failed to attract buyers. In the most recent auction, the reserve price was reduced by 10% to ₹93.5 crore compared to the previous auction held in March.

Luke awoke to a strange feeling. Something was off. It didn't take him long to place it—the music was different. Sad. It wasn't like his music was always joyful—some days, when he was stressed or angry, it was darker—but this seemed arbitrary. Was this a premonition of some terrible event? 

He tried to shove it out of his mind. Perhaps, if he didn't pay attention to it, it couldn't affect him. Downstairs, he ate breakfast, but a certain feeling of gloom lingered. He decided that once he got used to the music, he would feel better. But he couldn't. It stayed there, in the back of his mind, shifting so that he could never get used to it. He went to school, but he couldn't focus. He was convinced something awful was imminent. Why wouldn't it just happen, so he could go back to living his life? 

Then it hit him: He was going to die. It had to be. That was the only logical answer. He wasn't upset about anything, and, as of yet, nothing bad had happened. Luke wished he could ask someone, but there was nobody he could talk to who was dead. He just had to accept his fate. 

“Mr. Terrence!” said Luke's teacher, Mr. Soares. Luke jerked his head up. “Well, Luke, are we learning today?” Mr. Soares asked, his tone condescending. 

Luke was just about to say yes, to avoid conflict, when he remembered he was going to die. “Don't think so, Mr. Soares. ” He stood, slammed his textbook, and walked out. 

He rushed, full of adrenaline, down the hall. How would he die, he wondered. The music, ominous, was louder.

يبدو أن سوق الانتقالات يشهد نشاطاً ملحوظاً، حيث تفيد التسريبات بأن برشلونة يسعى لضم اللاعب ماتيس دي ليخت من يوفنتوس، زميل كريستيانو رونالدو، في وقت يظهر فيه الهولندي اهتماماً بهذا الانتقال. وانضم دي ليخت إلى يوفنتوس قادماً من أياكس أمستردام الصيف الماضي مقابل 75 مليون يورو بعقد يمتد لخمس سنوات.

ووفقاً لما نقلته "موندو ديبورتيفو" عن "إس"، فإن دي ليخت يتابع عن كثب المباحثات المستمرة بين الناديين، والتي قد تشمل تبادل لاعبين، حيث يبدي بطل إيطاليا اهتماماً بضم البرازيلي آرثور. يبدو أن يوفنتوس قدم عرضاً أفضل عندما ضم المدافع الشاب في العام الماضي، ولكن يبدو أن دي ليخت يفكر جدياً في عرض برشلونة.

وقد تم الحديث سابقاً عن اهتمام برشلونة بالمدافع الهولندي، حيث قيل إن ميسي يريده خليفة لجيرار بيكيه، وقد حث الأرجنتيني ناديه على ضمه، خصوصاً أن ريال مدريد أبدى رغبة في تعزيز دفاعه بالموهبة الهولندية الشابة.

ومع عقد يمتد حتى عام 2024، لن تكون المفاوضات لضم دي ليخت إلى القلعة الكاتالونية سهلة، لكن نقاد الكرة يرون أنه بوجود الوكيل مينو رايولا، كل شيء يصبح ممكناً.

أثار مقتل الصحفية البلغارية، فيكتوريا مارينوفا، استياء كبيرًا في أوساط الاتحاد الأوروبي، مما دفع منظمة الأمن والتعاون في أوروبا للدعوة إلى فتح تحقيق سريع في الحادثة. كانت الصحفية قد أطلقت مشروع عمل خاص في سبتمبر لجمع الحقائق حول أموال مسروقة من الاتحاد الأوروبي، قبل أن يتم العثور على جثتها في حديقة بمدينة روزا البلغارية بالقرب من نهر الدانوب.

صرح ممثل منظمة الأمن والتعاون الأوروبية حول حرية الإعلام، أرليم دزير، بأنه صُدم لقتل الصحفية البلغارية والطريقة الوحشية التي استخدمت لقتلها. وقال: "صدمت لقتل الصحفية بطريقة وحشية، وسأتابع عن كثب مجريات التحقيق. كما أحث السلطات الرسمية على العثور على المجرمين وتقديمهم للعدالة بأسرع وقت، وتحديد ما إذا كانت عملية القتل ترتبط بما تمارسه الصحفية في عملها".

The author of "The Challenge of Exploring Venus" highlights in the first paragraph that Venus, known as the "Evening Star," is often mistaken for a star due to its brightness in the night sky. However, it is actually the second planet from the sun.

In the second paragraph, Venus is described as Earth's "twin" due to similarities in size and shape. Despite these resemblances, one key difference lies in their respective orbital speeds. The paragraph also mentions that humans have sent multiple spacecraft to explore this neighboring planet.

Moving on to paragraph three, it is noted that Venus has a dense atmosphere comprising almost 97% of blankets-like layers with corrosive sulfuric acid clouds. The extreme temperatures on Venus can reach up to 800 degrees Fahrenheit with an atmospheric pressure 90 times higher than that on Earth – capable of crushing even deep-sea submarines.

The author questions in the fourth paragraph why scientists are so keen on studying a seemingly inhospitable planet like Venus. While acknowledging astronomers' fascination with what was possibly an Earth-like world in its past, they remain skeptical about its potential for hosting life despite having once been covered by oceans.

Lastly, NASA's plans to send humans to Venus are discussed in the fifth paragraph – proposing a spacecraft designed to navigate above Venus's stormy conditions at a distance while maintaining internal temperatures around 170 degrees Fahrenheit. These paragraphs collectively underscore why venturing into exploration missions towards Venus poses significant challenges and risks.

Los ultras del Plzen, cargados todos ellos de bengalas, estaban en esa zona. En el minuto 81 del partido, una bengala impactó en una aficionada del Sparta de Praga, que quedó tendida sobre los asientos. Afortunadamente, la mujer solo sufre heridas, pero pudo ser una desgracia. Rápidamente la evacúan y el partido se interrumpe durante 10 minutos.

La policía detenía a dos ultras del Plzen y al que lanzó la bengala podrían caerle hasta 10 años de prisión. Ambos equipos han querido pronunciarse. El Viktoria Plzen se disculpó por un "acto despiadado": "No consideramos a esas personas como nuestros aficionados". 

Por su parte, el Sparta de Praga publicó un tuit en el que instan a "evitar que todos los agresores ingresen al fútbol en el futuro".

I took a sip of the mug of coffee in my hands and asked, "So... by any chance, Mr. Moon Young, can you tell me once again why you're at my door?" The man looked around dazedly before focusing on me again and coughing.

"I was told you bought a star a couple of years ago, and I've come to purchase it back from you," he said, adjusting his mustache, which had slid a bit off his face.

There were a lot of red flags in this situation. For one, Mr. Moon Young's name is Korean. We're in Texas. On top of that, he stood nervously, much like a girl would, twiddling his thumbs and playing with his hair. Not that I'm judging him or anything.

I'd have to say the biggest telltale sign was when he sneezed and his mustache came off. Or maybe the fact that he was blue, like a smurf.

"Uh, sure thing, Moon Young. How much do you intend to buy it for?" I asked, watching the older man's knees cross as he thought of a price.

"Uh... A million earth dollars?"

"What?!" I exclaimed excitedly, only to see Moon Young's eyes dart around nervously. I calmed myself down. "Alright, sold."

All of Moon Young's flustering culminated in a rush of excitement as they picked me up and spun me around before I could protest. They didn't seem to account for their hat and wig falling off, revealing long locks of silver hair.

"Uh, oh my..." she muttered, her jacket slipping to reveal a somewhat bound chest. I thought ET would teach me all I needed to know about aliens, but I guess Huniepop did otherwise.

La crisis del coronavirus nos ha llevado a encender el televisor en busca de información. Según la consultora Barlovento Comunicación, en España, más de 41 millones de espectadores han visto los informativos durante el estado de alarma, lo que supone un crecimiento de 2,5 millones de espectadores respecto a febrero de 2020. Todas las cadenas, tanto públicas como privadas, estatales y autonómicas, han experimentado un incremento. 

La consultora destaca un aumento mínimo del 30% en el consumo de televisión en todas las comunidades autónomas. Los incrementos son excepcionales, sobresaliendo la región de Cantabria con más del 50% de subida en el consumo televisivo.

En el caso de À Punt, la cadena pública valenciana, la cuota media ha sido del 3,4% en un marzo marcado por la pandemia. A pesar de perder la emisión de actos festivos, sus datos han mejorado, y las cadenas adscritas a la red Forta registran un aumento mensual del 0,7%. La consultora subraya un incremento de 2,4 puntos en los informativos de À Punt, situándolos como los quintos con mayor crecimiento entre las autonómicas. Los informativos matinales, Les Notícies del Matí, alcanzan una cuota del 14,6% con 22.000 espectadores de media, estableciendo un récord, mientras que la tertulia posterior atrae a 23.000 espectadores de media, aunque baja su cuota al 6,6%.

Según los datos de À Punt, los informativos han sido el contenido preferido por los espectadores. El informativo más visto fue la edición de noticias de mediodía (NTC mitgdia) del 10 de marzo, seguido por 337.000 espectadores. Este espacio ha sido el más visto cada mediodía, con una cuota media del 10,9% y 117.000 espectadores diarios, duplicando los resultados del mes anterior.

Las emisiones de programas de entretenimiento como Atrapa'm si pots también han elevado la media de la cadena; el programa de Eugeni Alemany tuvo el 31 de marzo una media de 103.000 espectadores y una cuota del 5,1%, alcanzando picos de hasta 180.000 espectadores. La misa del domingo también reportó buenos datos para la televisión pública, con un 5,4% de audiencia y 36.000 espectadores durante el mediodía del domingo.

Today, I will be discussing the "Face on Mars." Some individuals claim that there are aliens residing on Mars who created the face structure. However, as a member of NASA, I have valid arguments against this notion.

Firstly, the face on Mars bears a resemblance to a human face, which raises doubts about alien involvement, considering that aliens have never interacted with humans to know our appearance. Additionally, if NASA were to propose the existence of alien life, it could significantly benefit financially, which adds a layer of skepticism to such claims.

Therefore, I firmly believe that the theory of alien life on Mars lacks substantial evidence. Despite my efforts, there are still individuals who persist in their belief in aliens, despite the lack of conclusive proof. In reality, the existence of aliens on Mars is highly unlikely, and I stand by this assertion. Thank you, and I am available to provide further information, if necessary.

Since the introduction of the transformer (Vaswani et al., 2017), which revolutionized natural language processing research (Brown et al., 2020; Devlin et al., 2018; Raffel et al., 2020), there has been a significant focus on the increasing quadratic cost associated with longer sequence lengths. While traditional academic benchmarks typically do not demand sequence lengths exceeding 4096, various real-world applications, such as multi-round chat (Team, 2023; Yao et al., 2023), biological sequence modeling (Ahdritz et al., 2022; Avsec et al., 2021; Dalla-Torre et al., 2023; Jumper et al., 2020; Lin et al., 2022), and the analysis of computer programs (Alam et al., 2023a; Muennighoff et al., 2023; Rozière et al., 2023), necessitate longer sequences. The distinct challenges, data, and sequence dynamics inherent in each application significantly impact the effectiveness of various techniques, a facet not extensively explored in the existing Transformer literature.

This paper focuses on the classification of malware using byte-level representations of executables (Raff and Nicholas, 2017b), a task that, in common real-world scenarios, may require sequence lengths of up to 200 million. While the processing of such extreme lengths in entirety may not be feasible, we regard it as a crucial research avenue to evaluate and enhance algorithms for handling long-sequence tasks.

Aurora James, the founder of the sustainable shoe company Brother Vellies, has a knack for creating events that feel just like home. Clad in a top hat and a checkered skirt and blazer, reminiscent of a character straight out of a Wes Anderson movie, she successfully delivered this cozy, at-home vibe last night. The occasion was the launch dinner for her new Nudes shoe collection, held in the Wine Room at Gemma, a quaint Italian restaurant at The Bowery Hotel.

In collaboration with Moda Operandi, James sought to "recontextualize what nude means as a woman of color." As a designer who is attentive to the nuances of melanin and skin tones, she explained, “a light pink can’t be the only reference for nude." The dimly lit room was filled with a table displaying a mélange of sandy, chocolate, and hazelnut-hued flats and feathery sandals. Dripping candles dotted the space, while soft jazz filled the ears of everyone in attendance.

James had gathered an impressive group of mostly women from different industries who have had an impact on her life to kick off Black History Month and celebrate this significant collection. Among the guests were Elaine Welteroth, Jordan Casteel, Lindsay Peoples Wagner, and Ibtihaj Muhammed. “I wanted to bring together a small group of mostly women, from all different industries, that have had an impact on me, to kick off Black History Month and help celebrate this necessary collection,” James said.

During the dinner, a polaroid camera was passed around between courses of apple-hazelnut burrata and gnocchi with wild mushrooms, allowing the ladies to capture their moments. The meal culminated in a heartwarming speech from James, and it ended on a sweet note with warm chocolate cake.

Even after the meal concluded, the laughter and girl talk continued, with no one seeming eager to leave. As Welteroth put it, “Aurora has a way of building an entire whimsical world around her work—it’s the kind of world where women of color feel celebrated, centered, and desired.

阿布扎比站的比赛中，韦斯达宾（Max Verstappen）成功打破咸美顿（Lewis Hamilton）的垄断，赢得职业生涯首个世界冠军。这场比赛因末段的撞车意外和裁判的争议判决而备受关注，咸美顿的失冠引起了广泛讨论。比赛中，两位车手同得369.5分进入终极冠军战，「韦少」在中后段曾一度落后超过10秒，全靠拉迪菲失控撞栏引发安全车出动，才缩小了差距。韦斯达宾随后换胎，在最后一圈顺利超越咸美顿，终结了咸美顿的8冠梦想。

这场F1世界冠军激战扣人心弦，韦斯达宾奇迹封王，与咸美顿斗到最后一圈的过程让车迷们久久回味。然而，许多人为咸美顿失冠而抱不平，包括歌手兼赛车迷林俊杰（JJ）。林俊杰在社交网站上发文表示：「有一种胜利叫不光彩，有一种败北叫冤枉。」他对咸美顿失冠的不满源于其对F1的热爱，以及他本人在2016年取得的国际汽车联盟（FIA）的职业赛车牌照。

除此之外，林俊杰与咸美顿私交甚好。在2017年新加坡大奖赛期间，他曾亲赴赛场为咸美顿加油。此次比赛结束后，他再次表达了对裁判判决的不满。

值得一提的是，在英超领域，哈利卡尼也变成了一位赛车迷，为同乡咸美顿未能夺得世界冠军而感到不公。无论是车迷还是同僚，很多人都对这场戏剧性的比赛结果有着自己的看法和情感。

点图睇：韦斯达宾封王一刻

阿塞拜疆站的比赛同样激动人心，佩雷斯戏剧性地夺得分站冠军，成为红牛的新晋大佬。这场比赛因意外引发的末段大混战也成为了赛事的热议焦点。

I mulled over what had just transpired while a friendly weatherman bestowed us with blue skies in our five day forecast. The next morning, I slept in. The last night's incident had brought hope, but let's call a spade a spade. I wasn't scheduled to work that morning so the day would have to wait for me. Around noon, I just laid in bed staring at a ceiling who's sorry state aptly described the rest of my apartment.

The last month had been rough. I had been depressed, but I was enjoying it. I wasn't watching myself cry in the mirror, but I wanted to be sad. Thinking back to the call, things could be different now. Jenny. Some future version of me was able to win Jenny back. Last week I would have jumped at the opportunity. Something about the desperation in the stranger's voice over the phone last night was unsettling.

I had decided I would head down to the coffee shop where she worked. To my amazement, she had been thinking about me too. At first we had decided to just date for a little while and try starting over. After a few awkward dates, it was clear that this wasn't working so we changed our tactic. We tried just being friends that met up a couple nights a week for a movie or dinner. Four miserable weeks later, we called it quits and I had forgotten what had made me so desperate to make it work.

There's really not much to tell over the next couple of years. I still had my run-of-the-mill nine to five job. I tried dipping my toe in the dating waters, but found the relationships to be empty. Radio silence ended between Jenny and I after a chance meeting at a nearby Subway (not the transportation kind, think sandwich artists!) She looked great. She said I looked great. This time we were able to actually start over.

When things inevitably started falling apart between Jenny and I again, I couldn't help but think back to that mysterious phone call from "future me." How many times had I tried to make this work? This is tragically romantic, right? Something keeps pulling us together. How many times had it failed and I had to try again? At least thirty times. Why? She was great, but I always walked on egg shells trying to ensure our relationship would last. Maybe that was its undoing. Some future version of myself, if that wasn't just some weird dream, was able to make this work.

It's been another 3 years since. Just as predicted, Jenny and I are married. I finally wore her down. We were meant to be together and she finally saw it. Marriage vows haven't made our relationship any more solid, though. I guess I'm happy. I desperately want to believe myself when I say that. Six years ago I was depressed and alone. Now I'm not.

I sigh deeply with regret. My mind is made up. I've been staring at the clock for the last 5 minutes, tapping my phone nervously to keep it from going to sleep. My old phone number is glowing back up at me while I watch the sky for a spark.

"Uh..." I laughed. "Real funny. I'm hanging up now." "No no no no!" the voice said. "Please, just listen to me. I didn't believe it either!" I waited, filling the phone with an astonished silence.

Have you ever been in your car and thought, "I wish my car could drive itself"? Well, it seems you have a fairy godmother because your wish has just come true. Driverless cars are now in the design phase, and they are proving to be incredibly efficient. They are also much easier to manage. Driverless cars simplify life for everyone and need to be manufactured.

These autonomous vehicles can significantly reduce your risk of an accident. Equipped with advanced sensors, they can detect when an object is too close. As the author points out, "Those sensors have become more advanced to detect and respond to the danger of out-of-control skids or rollovers." This demonstrates how these cars can enhance the safety of not just you but also your family. Additionally, the cars are equipped with automatic brakes, which can help prevent collisions. The author illustrates this with, "They can cause the car to apply brakes to individual wheels and reduce power from the engine." This shows how the car can avert accidents.

Moreover, these driverless cars are much easier to handle. One way they are easier to manage is their ability to navigate work zones independently. The author illustrates this with the statement, "They can steer..." indicating their capability to steer by themselves. They can also navigate around accidents, with the author noting the vehicle's ability to maneuver around obstacles it encounters.

If that's not enough to convince you, these cars also keep drivers more alert. They can quickly grab the driver's attention when an issue arises.

股神巴菲特：负利率令他困惑 但并非可怕
美国联邦储备系统在上周日（3月15日）紧急降息了1个百分点，将联邦基金利率降至0到0.25个百分点之间，创下2008年金融危机以来的最低水平。市场担心联邦储备系统是否会进一步采取负利率政策，对此，股神巴菲特在不久前接受外国媒体采访时表示，负利率令他感到困惑，但并非可怕，他也不害怕负利率。
巴菲特表示，他从来无法预测利率，认为利率虽然很重要，但是无法预测。
这次访谈是在上周进行的，当时他表示，近期股市暴跌的主要原因是新冠肺炎疫情和国际油价暴跌两个因素同时影响，他坦言自己89年的人生中第一次经历到这种情况。
实际上，过去几天美国股市疲软，即使是股神也遭受了损失。据估算，从2月19日美股创下新高以来，截至本周二（17日），巴菲特的股票投资组合损失了约800亿美元（约合6,240亿港元），跌幅达到32%。
巴菲特持有的三个主要股票，苹果、美国银行和可口可乐，分别损失了199.5亿美元、132亿美元和58亿美元。

Réjean Hébert, professeur à l'École de santé publique de l'Université de Montréal, souligne que des solutions existent pour corriger la situation et mettre en place des mesures préventives afin d'éviter une répétition du drame vécu par les personnes âgées vulnérables. Il est crucial de tourner l'attention médiatique non seulement vers la tragédie actuelle, mais aussi de se préparer pour l'après-catastrophe.

Il est primordial de comprendre les causes profondes de l'impact dévastateur de la COVID-19 sur les personnes vivant en milieu collectif. Il est essentiel de prendre des mesures correctives rapidement après une analyse approfondie. En effet, le Québec vieillit rapidement, et il est impératif d'adapter nos structures et services à cette nouvelle réalité démographique.

La crise actuelle met en lumière les lacunes dans notre système de santé, en particulier en ce qui concerne les soins aux personnes âgées, que ce soit en institution ou à domicile. Il est essentiel de revaloriser le rôle des préposés, de redonner aux CHSLD une gestion locale efficace, et d'améliorer le financement des services à domicile pour permettre aux aînés de rester dans leur environnement.

Pour garantir des soins de qualité et adaptés aux besoins des personnes âgées, il est essentiel de repenser le financement des services, en se concentrant sur les besoins des individus plutôt que sur les institutions. Des modèles comme l'assurance autonomie proposée dans le passé offrent une piste à suivre pour améliorer les services à domicile.

En conclusion, Réjean Hébert souligne l'importance de revenir à une approche centrée sur les besoins des personnes âgées, en garantissant des services de qualité à domicile et en réformant notre système de santé pour mieux répondre aux défis du vieillissement de la population.

There was a land that the world liked best. It was in the center, closer to the origins of life. It was the oldest land, where it all began. In the north deserts spread harsh and vast, covering the earth in endless sand. South came the jungles and the wetlands that gave life and water to the world. Even further were plains with lakes and hills, and a great mountain. It was sacred and old, and some said if you looked inside you would see the dawning of all life before it burned your eyes in your skull. Next to the mountain was a deep crater so wide it would take a day's walk to go from one edge to the other. In the crater and around it they built a city, invisible to the untrained eye, but if you knew the path the sight of it was breathtaking. Tan stone rose from the ground, becoming an extension of the world and not an enemy. This was where the palace lay, ruled by its king.

What gay rights movement are you talking about? The last significant movement in this country seemed to end with the controversial figure who occupied the Oval Office. Remember back in 2016, when the people of the United States elected someone whose conduct raised eyebrows? It's not like we knew his wife would walk in on him in a compromising situation with his male assistant. You'd think there'd be some backlash from it, right? But there was absolutely none. Since then, much of the country has felt like a continuous parade, reminiscent of San Francisco.

Before sending a saucy text, you should always check you’re messaging the right person. Sadly, one bloke failed to follow this advice when trying to sext a girl from his school. A MAN was horrified to discover he’d sent an explicit picture to the wrong person. When he realized he sent an explicit photo to a complete stranger, he was absolutely mortified.

Reddit user Th3GreenMan56 uploaded snaps of the exchange to the viral platform. The messages show his confusion at being contacted by an unknown number. The mystery texter, who claimed to be called “Brandon,” looked like he was trying to get his leg over. In response to the awkward request to “hang out,” the Redditor insisted that he wasn’t the woman Brandon was after. He replied: “Brandon, you have the wrong number. I’m not a woman, I literally have a mustache.”

This wasn’t enough to stop the stranger from sexting him, as he then sent over a picture of his privates. At his wit's end, the Reddit user replied with a selfie to prove that he was a total stranger. Upon realizing he’d texted the wrong number, Brandon could only manage to utter the word “no.”

Since the cringeworthy exchange was posted on Reddit, it's racked up 57,000 upvotes. Many found the sexting disaster hilarious and admitted it made them laugh out loud. One commenter wrote: “This is it. This is the perfect conversation. I’ve been laughing for 10 minutes now.” Another said: “Outstanding. I needed that laugh today.”

"Who's a good girl? Whoooo's a good girl!" I exclaimed cheerfully as I patted the fluffy fur of my feline companion, Pebbles. She lounged contentedly on my lap, reveling in the attention. Pebbles let out a deep purr as she rolled around, almost tumbling off my lap in her blissful state. I knew the signs – cats could quickly shift from pure happiness to madness. And Pebbles was definitely at the peak of joy.

Before I could react, Pebbles had my hand between her paws, playfully nipping at my fingers like she hadn't eaten in days. "Ouch!" I winced as her sharp teeth dug into my skin. "Okay, that's enough attention for now," I said firmly. As she hopped down to the floor, I gave her one last stroke, unintentionally tugging her tail a bit too hard.

A sharp yowl filled the room as Pebbles darted away from me. I felt guilty. "Oh hon, I'm sorry!" I apologized, but she only gave me a stern look in response. Attempting to soothe her, I spoke softly, but all I received was a twitch of her tail tip. *Sigh.* Typical cat behavior.

Suddenly, a strange noise came from Pebbles' rear end, and to my horror, her backside started to peel open. Her tail lifted towards her spine, hissing as it extended, and then her tush seemed to transform with a mechanical sound.

Shocked, I blurted out, "What the heck?" as Pebbles raced out of the room with her new hindquarters mechanism, disappearing under the bed. I sat frozen, trying to process what I had just witnessed. Cat butts don't detach from cats, do they? I pinched myself – no, I wasn't dreaming. Was Pebbles some sort of robot cat now?

After coaxing Pebbles out from under the bed with treats, I examined the unusual port embedded in her "rear end." I decided not to dwell on the details, focusing instead on the fact that my cat seemed to have a USB port. How did this happen? Was someone conducting bizarre experiments on cats? My mind raced with questions as I connected a USB cable to her port.

As I contemplated potential cat viruses and ran scans on my computer, a surprising popup appeared, indicating that Pebbles needed an update. Confused yet intrigued, I decided to proceed cautiously. However, the update unexpectedly caused Pebbles to have a seizure.

Frantically trying to cancel the update and save her, I watched in disbelief as Pebbles transformed before my eyes. She grew larger, her fur more luxurious, and her eyes took on a mesmerizing swirl of colors. Struggling to comprehend the situation, I was shocked when Pebbles communicated with me telepathically, revealing a plea for help to prevent a larger threat.

Stunned but determined, I realized that Pebbles needed me now more than ever. I steeled myself for the unknown challenges ahead, ready to embark on a new journey with my extraordinary feline companion.

Sarah Michelle Gellar recently admitted that she almost forgot about her 19th wedding anniversary with her husband, Freddie Prinze Jr, which fell on Wednesday. It wasn't until friends began congratulating her on nearly two decades with the "She's All That" actor that she remembered. To mark the occasion, the actress made a rare move by sharing a black-and-white photo from their 2002 wedding.

Expressing her gratitude, she captioned her Instagram post, "I would like to take this opportunity to thank @goodmorningamerica and @usweekly for alerting my #momsquad that it was indeed our anniversary, and in turn thank my #momsquad for alerting me." Gellar, a mother-of-two who gained fame as the lead in "Buffy the Vampire Slayer" from 1997 to 2003, then humorously added, "I honestly thought it was tomorrow." She also directly addressed her husband, sending him wishes for a long life and happiness. "Happy anniversary today, tomorrow, and any day after that I think might be our anniversary in the future."

In response, Freddie playfully wrote in the comment section, "I'm sticking with tomorrow. I don't care what they said."

As I sat in my psychologist's office, I found myself absentmindedly doodling on my notepad while he spoke. I preferred to have something to occupy my hands during our sessions; merely sitting on a couch and answering questions felt aimless and unproductive to me. I couldn't see any tangible or meaningful outcome from our discussions, and I felt like my time was being wasted, which I found frustrating.

"Just take a moment to observe," my psychologist urged. "Think about how many diverse individuals there are in the world—nearly seven billion people."

"I understand," I responded, my pen still moving across the paper.

"How, then, can you believe that you are the only remaining human being?" he questioned.

I deliberately left the question unanswered, hoping he would contemplate it deeply and arrive at the realization on his own. I didn't want to spell it out, but I soon realized that he couldn't comprehend my perspective, as he was not truly human.

With a sigh, the psychologist concluded, "Our session is over for today. You can settle the payment at the reception desk."

I lingered on the couch, completing my drawing, while the psychologist, though visibly impatient, waited for me, tapping his foot.

Once I finished, I made my decision to respond, and I rose, the drawing in my hand, to reveal my artwork to the psychologist, a depiction of his wife and son, a replication of the photo I had seen on the front counter. I handed the drawing to him, and, to my surprise, he expressed his gratitude, smiling warmly.
